GK16andhvc2u:6: avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaner vācyaṃ dvidhā matam // DhvK_2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:10: locanam dvitīya uddyotaḥ yā smaryamāṇā śreyāṃsi sūte dhvaṃsayate rujaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:18: tatra dviprakāraprakāśane vṛttikārakṛte yannimittaṃ bījabhūtamiti bālapriyā dvitīya uddyotaḥ locanasyottarasyāto na vyākhyā prapyate 'tra tat /
GK16andhvc2u:22: janaiḥ smaryamāṇā satī, teṣāṃ śreyāṃsi sūte janayati /
GK16andhvc2u:26: yadvā-abhīṣṭāni phalāni yasyāṃ sā udārā mahatī ca kalpavallī tāmiti rūpakam /
GK16andhvc2u:55: tatra prathamoddyote vṛttikāreṇa prakāśitaḥ avivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo 'vāntaraprakārastatpratipādanāyedamucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:56: tadavāntarabhedapratipādanadvāreṇaiva cānuvādadvāreṇāvivakṣitavācyasya yaḥ prabhedo vivakṣitānyaparavācyātprabhinnatvaṃ tatpratipādanāyedamucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:59: saṅkramitamiti ṇicā vyañcanāvyāpāre yaḥ sahakārivargastasyāyaṃ prabhāva ityuktaṃ tiraskṛtaśabdena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:60: yena vācyenāvivakṣitena satāvivakṣitāvācyo dhvanirvyapadiśyate tadvācyaṃ dvidheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:61: yo 'rthaṃ upapadyamano 'pi tāvataivānupayogāddharmāntarasaṃvalanayānyatāmiva gato lakṣyamāṇo 'nugatadharmī sūtranyāyenāste sa rūpāntarapariṇata uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:62: bālapriyā “iti pratamodyota” ityuktatvādatra pakṣe tatreti tatpadena tasya parāmarśa ityāhṛ--
GK16andhvc2u:66: atra pakṣe ata iti śeṣo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:108: dharmāntarasaṃvalanayā vācyadharmātiriktadharmaprakārakapratītiviṣayatvena hetunā anyatāṃ gata iva lakṣyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:109: anugatadharmī san lakṣyamāṇadharmāṇāṃ tatra tatra bhinnatve 'pi vyaktirūpo dharmī anustūta eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:114: snigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladbalākā dhanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:115: locanam yastvanupapadyamāna upāyatāmātreṇārthāntarapratipattiṃ kṛtāv palāyata iva sa tiraskṛta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:116: nanu vyaṅgyātmano yadā dhvanerbhedo nirūpyate tadā vācyasāya dvidheti bhedakathanaṃ na saṅgatamityāśaṅkyāha--
GK16andhvc2u:120: vyañjake tvarthe yadi dhvaniśabdastadā na kaściddoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:124_0: snigdhayā jalasambandhasarasayā śyāmalayā draviḍavanitocitāsitavarṇayā kāntyā cākacakyena
GK16andhvc2u:124_1: liptamācchuritaṃ viyannabho yaiḥ vellantyo vijṛmbhamāṇāstatā calantyaḥ parabhāgavaśātpraharṣavaśācca
GK16andhvc2u:124_2: balākāḥ bālapriyā rūpāntarapariṇata iti arthāntare saṅkramitamityasyaiva vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:140: viśeṣa ityasyānantaraṃ 'iti vyaṅgyaprakāśanaparasya dhvanerevāyaṃ prakāraḥ' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:145: tatrādyapakṣe avivakṣitavācyasyetyasya avivakṣitaḥ apradhānīkṛto vācyassvātmā yena sa iti prathamodyotoktārthau bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:164: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarve sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava //
GK16andhvc2u:165: locanam sitapakṣiviśeṣā yeṣu ta evaṃ nabhastāvaddurālokaṃ vartate /
GK16andhvc2u:167: yataḥ sūkṣmajalakaṇodgāriṇo vātā iti mandamandatvameṣāmaniyatadigāgamanaṃ ca bahuvacanena sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:169: payodānāṃ ye suhṛdasteṣu ca satsu ye śobhanahṛdayā mayūrāsteṣāmānandena harṣeṇa kalāḥ ṣaṅjasaṃvādinyo madhurāḥ kekāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ tāśca sarvaṃ payodavṛttāntaṃ dussahaṃ smārayanti;
GK16andhvc2u:171: evamuddīpanavibhāvodbodhitavipralambhaḥ parasparādhiṣṭānatvadrateḥ vibhāvānāṃ sādhāraṇatāmabhimanyamānaḥ ita eva prabhṛti priyatamāṃ hṛdayenidhāyaiva svātmavṛttāntaṃ tāvadāha--
GK16andhvc2u:179: sa bālapriyā śīkarima iti śīkarasambandhapratipādanena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:187: śobhanahṛdayā iti ata evānanda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:215: tathāca kaṭhorahṛdayapadantadarthānuguṇānāmeva dharmāṇāṃ rāmaśabdena vyañjene sahaṅkāritayā nirdiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:218: anena hi vyaṅgyadharmāntarapariṇataḥ sañjñī pratyāyyate, na saṃjñimātram /
GK16andhvc2u:223: uktaprakāreṇa hṛdayanihitāṃ priyāṃ smaraṇaśabdavikalpaparamparayā pratyakṣībhāvitāṃ hṛdayasphoṭanonmukhīṃ sasaṃbhramamāha--
GK16andhvc2u:233: pratīyamānaṃ tu tadasaṅkhyamanudbhi viseṣatvenaiva kiṃ kiṃ rūpaṃ na sahata iti citrapānakarasāpūpaguḍamodakasthānīyavicitracarvaṇāpadaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:245: śabdaḥ vaidehīti śabdaḥ, tajjanitabodha iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:271: anudbhinnaḥ aspaṣṭaḥviśeṣaḥ pārthakyaṃ parasparabheda iti yāvat, yatra tatvenaiva tadviśiṣṭameva /
GK16andhvc2u:273: kintu parasparasaṃvalitatvenaiva prayojanapratītau tathā rājyanirvāsanādayo dharmā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:280: guḍopaskṛtaṃ modakaṃ guḍamodakaṃ tatsthānīyā taccarvaṇākatulyā yā vicitrā vilakṣaṇā carvaṇā rāmagatatvena tattaddharmāvagāhinī pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:281: tasyāḥ padaṃ viṣaya yathā ca mamaiva viṣamabāṇalīlāyām---
GK16andhvc2u:282: tālā jāanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppānti /
GK16andhvc2u:288: locanam eṣa eva sarvatra prayojanasya pratīyamānatvenotkarṣaheturmantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:289: mātragrahaṇena saṃjñī nātra tiraskṛta ityāha---yathā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:296: tena śuddhe 'rthe mukhye bādhānimittaṃ tatrārthe taddharmasamavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:297: tena nimittena rāmaśabdo dharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:309: atra rāmapadalakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ rāmapadavācyatvaṃ sāmānyato duḥkhapātratvaṃ vā bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:312: tadā guṇāḥ atiśayādhāyako dharmo gumastadvantaḥ santaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:319: raviṃṇā kiraṇānugṛhītānikaraspṛṣṭāni, atha cābhinanditāni kamalāni pajhāni /
GK16andhvc2u:324: lakṣmīpātratvādi yaddharmāntaraśataṃ tasya citratā citratāviśiṣṭaṃ taditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:348: anupayogabādhito hyartho 'sya dhvanerviṣayo lakṣaṇā mūlaṃ hyasya /
GK16andhvc2u:349: yattu hṛdayadarpaṇa uktam---'hahā heti saṃrambhārtho 'yaṃ camatkāraḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:352: ahaṃ sahe tasyāḥ ki vartata ityevamātmā hi saṃrambhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:353: kamalapade ca kaḥ saṃrambha ityāstāṃ tāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:360: dvitīyaḥ kamalaśabdo lakṣmīpātratvādipariṇatamarthaṃ lakṣyati, vyaṅgyantu manoharatvādītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:362: dvītīyo guṇaśabdaḥ utkṛṣṭatvādidharmāntarapariṇatamarthaṃ lakṣyatītyādyāśaṅkāṃ parihartumāha---guṇaśabda ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:381: na tu lakṣaṇāyā viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:386: hahāhetyanena gabhyo yassaṃrambhaḥ tasyārthaḥ kāryabhūta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:396: ahaṃ sarvaṃ sahe ityarthasyopodbalako hi rāmaśabdābhivyaktārtha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:398: mukhyārthasya padārthāntarānvayānupapattijñānamiva prakṛtānuṣayuktatvajñānamapi lakṣaṇābījamato 'nupayuktatvajñānarūpo 'pi mukhyārthabādhāpadārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:408: locanam na ca tiraskṛtatvaṃ dharmirūpema, tasyāpi tāvatyanugamāt /
GK16andhvc2u:414: andho 'yaṃ puro 'pi na paśyatītyatra tiraskārondhārthasya na tvatyantam /
GK16andhvc2u:416: andhaśabdo 'tra padārthasphuṭīkaraṇāśaktatvaṃ naṣṭadṛṣṭigataṃ nimattīkṛtyādarśaṃ lakṣaṇayā pratipādayati /
GK16andhvc2u:418: bhaṭṭanāyakena tu yaduktam---'ivaśabdayāgādgoṇatāpyatra na kāvit'iti, tacchlokārthamaparāmṛśya /
GK16andhvc2u:430: prakṛtodāraṇe andhapadavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtatvaṃ viśadayitumanyatra tadabhāvaṃ darśayati---andha ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:451: niśvāsāndha iva ya ādarśastadrūpaścandramā iti yojanaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:454: ivaśabdasyobhayatra sambandho 'stviti śaṅkāṃ pariharan āha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:458: gaaṇaṃ ca mattamehaṃ dhārāluliajjuṇāiṃ a vaṇāiṃ /
GK16andhvc2u:460: locanam na ca niḥśvāsenāndha ivādarśaḥ sa iva candra iti kalpanā yuktā /
GK16andhvc2u:463: gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitārjunāni ca vanāni /
GK16andhvc2u:469: nirahaṅkāramṛgāṅkā nīlā apiniśā na kevalaṃ sitakarakaradhavalitāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:474: na hi svarūpādeva bhedo bhavatītyāṅkya vivaṅkṣitavācyādevāsya bhedo bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:476: bālapriyā gaganaṃ ceti varṣāvarṇanam. ca śabda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:489: pratiṣedhasya prasaktipūrvakatvānnarahaṅkāraśabdo hyahaṅkārasvarūpayogye cetanaviśeṣe eva svarasataḥ prayujyata ityato 'tra mukhyārthasyānvayānupapattirūpabādhā bodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:495: ujjigamiṣā unnatīcchā, tadrūpā yā jīgīṣā utkarṣecchā tattyāgaprabhṛtirityarthaḥ // 1 //
GK16andhvc2u:512: vivakṣitābhidheyasya dhvaner ātmā dvidhā mataḥ // DhvK_2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:517: sa ca vācyārthāpekṣayā kaścidalakṣyakramatayā prakāśate, kaścitkrameṇeti dvidhā mataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:518: locanam samyaṅ na lakṣayituṃ śakyaḥ kramo yasya tādṛśa uddyota uddyotanavyāpāro 'syeti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:525: idānīṃ tu dyotanavyāpāramukhena dyotyasya khātmaniṣṭa evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:526: vyaṅgyasya dhvanerdyetane svātnani kaḥ krama ityāśaṅkyāha----vācyārthāpekṣayeti /
GK16andhvc2u:530: yo rasādirarthaḥ sa evākramo dhvanerātmā na tvakrama eva saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:536: nanu kiṃ sarvadaiva rasādirartho dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:538: etacca sāmānyalakṣaṇe 'guṇīkṛtasvārthāvi'tyatra bālapriyā kuto noktamityata āha---dhvaniśabdetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:552: rasetyādikārikāyāmaṅgibhāvena bhāsamāno rasabhāvādiḥ akramo ghnanerātmā vyavasthita ityanvayo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:565: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityasya vivaraṇam--aṅgitvenetyādi etadukteḥ paunaruktyamāśaṅkate--rataccetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:574: sa ca rasādirdhvanirvyavasthita eva; na hi tacchūnyaṃ kāvyaṃ kiñcidasti /
GK16andhvc2u:575: yadyapi ca rasenaiva sarvaṃ jīvati kāvyam tathāpi tasya rasasyaikadhanacamatkārātmano 'pi kutaścidaṃśātprayojakībhūtādadhiko 'sau camatkāro bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:576: tatra yadā kaścidudriktāvasthāṃ pratipanno vyabhicārī camatkārātiśayaprayojako bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:578: yathā---- tiṣṭetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:579: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovavartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayoryāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:584: yathā-- yote gotraviparyaye śrutipathaṃ śayyāmanuprāptayā nirdhyātaṃ parivartanaṃ punarapi prārabdhumaṅgīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:587: aṅgibhāvena bhāsamāna ityuktāvaṅgabhāvena bhāne kaḥ prakāra iti jijñāsāyāḥ sambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:618: locanam bhūyastatprakṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ca śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ kraṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:619: atra hi praṇayakopasyojjigamiṣayaiva yadavasthānaṃ na tu pārita ityudayāvakāśanirākaraṇāttadevāsvādajīvitam /
GK16andhvc2u:624: atra cerṣyāvipralambhasya rasasyāpi praśama iti śakyaṃ yojayitum /
GK16andhvc2u:626: yathā--- osuru sumṭhi āhaṃ muhu cumbau jeṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:628: ityatra śrutyukte tu kope kopakaṣāyagadgadamandaruditāyā yena mukhaṃ cumbitaṃ tenāmṛtarasanigaraṇaviśrāntiparamparāṇāṃ tṛptirjñāteti kopaprasādasandhiścamatkārasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:636: śithilakṣiptaikadorlekhayā pūrvaṃ śithilā śitilīkṛtā paścādanyatra kṣiptā ca ekadorlekhā yayā tathā satyā /
GK16andhvc2u:639: jānātīcchati yatate ceṣṭate iti kramo 'tra pradarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:642: 'stanabharaḥ priyasya urasaḥ kraṣṭuṃ na pārita' iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:658: yadvā---amṛtarasasya viśrāntipūrvakāṇi nigaraṇāni viśramya viśramya nigaraṇāni /
GK16andhvc2u:663: yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc2u:664: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kutadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ sāvasthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati //
GK16andhvc2u:665: atra hi vitakāraitsukye matismaraṇe śahkādainye dhṛticintane parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvena dvandvaśo bhavantī,
GK16andhvc2u:666: paryante tu cintāyā eva pradhānatāṃ dadatī paramāsvādasthānam /
GK16andhvc2u:669: nanvevaṃ vibhāvānubhāvamukhenāpyadhikaścamatkāro dṛśyata iti vibhāvadvaniranubhāvadhvaniśca vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:671: taccarvaṇāpi cittavṛttiṣveva paryavasyatīti rasabhāvebhyo nādhikaṃ carvāṇīyam /
GK16andhvc2u:672: yadā tu vibhāvānubhāvāvapi vyaṅyau bhavatastadā vastudhvanirapi kiṃ na sahyate /
GK16andhvc2u:759: yadyapi 'śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsyaḥ' iti muninā nirūpitaṃ tathāpyauttarakālikaṃ tatra hāsyarasatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:760: dūrākarṣaṇamohamantra iva me tannāmni yāte śrutiṃ cetaḥ kālakalāmapi prakurute nāvasthitiṃ tāṃ vinā /
GK16andhvc2u:765: aścābhāsatā yenāsya sītā mayyupekṣikā dviṣṭā veti pratipattirhṛdayaṃ na spṛśatyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:768: ata eva tadābhāsatvaṃ vastutastatra sthāpyate śuktau rajatābhāsavat /
GK16andhvc2u:770: tathā ca tatra hāsyo raso vaktuṃ nyāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:773: taccarvaṇottaramayamananuraktāṃ kāmayata iti rāvaṇāmilāṣādyālamvitasya hāsasya sahṛdayānāmudbodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:775: 'etairākulitasya vikṣatarateraṅgairanaṅgāturaiḥ sampadyeta kathaṃ tadāptisukhaṃmityetanna vejhi sphuṭam' ityuttarārdham /
GK16andhvc2u:777: dūrākarṣaṇaṃ mohaśca tatkārī yo mantraḥ tasminnavetyupamā /
GK16andhvc2u:781: ākulitasya vihvalīkṛtasya vikṣatā naṣṭā ratiḥ viṣayāntareṣu ruciryasya tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:790: atra pratīyamānā ratirabhilāṣarūpā cittavṛttireva, na tu sthāyibhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:817: śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsya iti prayuñjāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:820: ata evābhilāṣe ekataraniṣṭe 'pi śṛṅgaraśabdena tatra tatra vyavahārastadābhāsatayā mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:822: evaṃ rasadhvanerevāmī bhāvadhvaniprabhṛtayo niṣyandā āsvāde pradhānaṃprayojakamevamaṃśaṃ vibhajya pṛthagvyavasthapyate /
GK16andhvc2u:824: rasadhvanistu sa eva yo 'tra mukhyatayā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyojanoditasthāyi pratipattikasya pratipattuḥ sthāyyaṃśacarvaṇāprayukta evāsvādaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:825: yathā--- kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntvā nitambasthale madhye 'syāstrivalītaraṅgaviṣame niḥṣpandatāmāgatā /
GK16andhvc2u:826: maddṛṣṭistṛṣiteva samprati śanerāruhya tuṅgo stanau sākāṅkṣaṃ muhurīkṣate jalalavaprasyandinī locane //
GK16andhvc2u:827: atra hi nāyikākārānuvarṇyamānasvātmapratikṛtipavitritacitraphalakāvalokanādvatsarājasya bālapriyā iti hyoko 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:834: kathaṃ tarhi pṛthagvyavahāra ityata āha---āsvāda iti /
GK16andhvc2u:841: ekāsvādaḥ yaḥ sammūrcchitasya vyāptasya āmodasya upabhogaḥ tasminnapi /
GK16andhvc2u:845: vibhāvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanena taccarvaṇāyā uditā utpannā sthāyipratipattiḥ yasya /
GK16andhvc2u:849: trivalyeva taraṅgaḥ taraṅgatulyā trivalī vā tena viṣame nimnonnate /
GK16andhvc2u:854: atroruyugasya nitambasya cātiviśālatvaṃ madhyasya tanutvaṃ stanayormahatvaṃ ca gamyata iti saundaryātiśayo jalalavetyādinā nāyikāyā virahaduḥkhātiśayasca vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:857: nāyikākāreṇa likhitanāyikāpratikṛtyā hetunā anuvarṇyamānaṃ narmasacivaṃ pratimaharvarṇyabhānaṃ svātmapratikṛtyā likhitanāyakapratikṛtyā pavitritaṃ ca,
GK16andhvc2u:860: idānīṃ rasavadalaṅkārādalakṣyakramadyotanātmano dhvanervibhakto viṣaya iti pradarśyate---
GK16andhvc2u:863: rasādi-paratā yatra sa dhvaner viṣayo mataḥ // DhvK_2.4 //
GK16andhvc2u:867: locanam parasparāsthābandharūpo ratisthāyibhāvo vibhāvānubhāvasaṃyojanavaśena carvaṇārūḍha iti /
GK16andhvc2u:877: anayā ca bhaṅgyā rasavadādiṣvalaṅkāreṣu rasādidhvanernāntarbhāva iti sūcayati /
GK16andhvc2u:878: pūrvaṃ hi samāsoktyādiṣu vastudhvanernāntarbhāva iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:879: vācyaṃ ca vācakaṃ ca taccārutvahetavaśceti dvandvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:883: nanūktaṃ bhaṭṭanāyakena---“raso yadā paragatatayā pratīyate tarhi tāṭasthyameva syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:884: na ca bālapriyā kartrā anuvarṇyamānā dṛśyamānā,
GK16andhvc2u:890: vācyetyādikārikāyāṃ 'śabdālaṅkārā' ityādivṛttau cārthāntarabhramaḥ syādityato vivakṣitamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe---vācyatrcetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:901: tāṭasthye sati svarasanīyatvaṃ na bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:903: 'asau svagatatvena na ca pratīyata' iti sambandhaḥ tatpratyāyakābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:909: kāntātvaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ vāsanāvikāsahetuvibhāvatāyāṃ prayojakamiti cet---devatāvarmanādau tadapi katham /
GK16andhvc2u:911: alokasāmānyānāṃ ca rāmādīnāṃ ye samudrasetubandhādayo vibhāvāṃste kathaṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ bhajeyuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:919: nanu rasa utpadyatāmityatrāha-sā cetyādi. sā ca svātmani rasotpatiśca /
GK16andhvc2u:927: vāsanāyāḥ sahṛdayagataratyādivāsanāyāḥ yo vikākaudbodhaḥ tasya heturyo vibhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:931: tathā ca sītāyāḥ mānuṣītvena sītādau sahṛdayānāṃ kāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:935: devatāsvamātrādernāyikātvena varṇanasthale devatādāvāradhyatvajñānena pratibandhāttatra kāmyatvarūpakāntātvasaṃvedanaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:936: nanu kāvyāditaḥ sītādijñāne jāte sahṛdayānāṃ svakāntāsmaraṇaṃ jāyate,
GK16andhvc2u:937: tena ca tadvāsanodvodha ityata āha---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:944: samudrasetubandhanānau utsāhahetuḥ svakṛtisādhyatvabuddhirhṛdayasaṃvādo vā sahṛdayānāṃ notpadyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:952: utpattipakṣe ca karuṇasyotpādādduḥkhitve karuṇaprekṣāsu punarapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:955: śaktirūpasya hi śṛṅgārasyabhivyaktau viṣayārjanatāratamyapravṛttiḥ syāt tatrāpi kiṃ khagato 'bhivyajyate rasaḥ paragato veti pūrvavadeva doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:956: tena na pratīyate notpadyate nābhivyajyate kāvyena rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:961: tatrābhidhābhāgo yadi śuddhaḥ syāttattantrādibhyaḥ śāstranyāyebhyaḥ śleṣādyalaṅkāraṇāṃ ko bhedaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:973: nanu ratyādirūpo rasaḥ sūkṣmarūpema sahṛdayānāmātmani vartata ityataḥ siddha evetyatrāha---śaktītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:979: viṣayo ratyādiviṣayaḥ kāntādiḥ abhivyaktyupāya iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:980: tasya arjane sampādane tāratamyapravṛttiḥ taratamabhāvena pravṛttiḥ syāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:981_1: janānāṃ pravṛttistathā vāsanātmatayā antaḥ sthitasya ratyāderadhikādhikābhivyaktaye
GK16andhvc2u:992: trayoṃ'sā yasya tasya bhāvastattā, tasyāḥ prasādātsambandhādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:994: vācyeti. vācyo 'rtho viṣayo yasya tat, vācyārthasambandhītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1003: śāstrai locanam tena rasabhāvanākhyo divatīyo vyāpāraḥ; yadvaśadabhidhā vilakṣaṇaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:1004: taccaitadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma rasān prati yatkāvyasya tadvibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇatvāpādanaṃ nāma /
GK16andhvc2u:1005_0: bhāvite ca rase tasya bhogaḥ yo 'nubhavasmaraṇapratipattibhyo vilakṣaṇa eva drutivistaravikāsātmā
GK16andhvc2u:1006: sa eva ca pradhānabhūtoṃ'śaḥ siddharūpa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1008: bālapriyā “halantyami“ti paṇinīyasūtrādāviva “sarvado mādhava” ityādiśleṣasthale 'pi tantrādinānekārthabodhasambhavādubhayorbhedo na syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1010: vṛttibhedāḥ upanāgarikādyāḥ teṣāṃ vaicitryaṃ ca akiñcitkaramiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1024: rasān prati etadbhāvakatvaṃ nāma taditi sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1038: tathāca bhāvanopanīto rāmādigataratyādiḥ sthāyī sahṛdayairbhujyamāno rasaḥ ratyādeḥ sādhāraṇyena pratītyā ca na tāṭasthyādidoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1041: anubhavasmaraṇarūpāḥ yāḥ pratīpattayo laukikyaḥ pratītayastābhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1047: nijacitsvabhāvā svātmacaitanyarūpā ca yā nivṛtiḥ lokottarānandaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1048: tasyāṃ viśrāntiḥ vigalitavedyāntaratayā sthitiḥ tallakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1049: atra rajaso guṇasyānuvedhena drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsa iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1050: uktaṃ hi kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---“yadāhi rajaso guṇasya drutiḥ tamaso vistāraḥ satvasya vikāsaḥ tadā bhogaḥ svarūpaṃ lamata” iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1057: pratipattṝṇāṃ locanam atrocyate---rasasvarūpa eva tāvadvipratipattayaḥ prativādinām /
GK16andhvc2u:1058: tathāhi-pūrvāvasthāyāṃ yaḥ sthāyī sa eva vyabhicārisampātādinā prāptaparipoṣo 'nukāryagata eva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1060: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ cittavṛttau cittavṛtteḥ cittavṛttyantareṇa kaḥ paripoṣārthaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1061: vismayaśokakrodhādeśca krameṇa tāvanna paripoṣa iti nānukārye rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1084: nāṭyasya nāṭyasambandhī vā raso nāṭyarasa iti vyutpattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1085: matamidaṃ dūṣayitvā prakārāntareṇa vadatāṃ śrīśaṅkukādīnāṃ mataṃ darśayati----pravāhetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1087: pravāhadharmiṇyāṃ tattatkāraṇavaśena punaḥ punarutpadyamānāyāṃ naśyantyāṃ ca satyāmiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc2u:1096: yathoktaṃ kāvyaprakāśasaṅkete---“iṣṭaviyogajo mahān śokaḥ kramema śāmyati,
GK16andhvc2u:1097: na tu dṛḍhībhavati krodhotsāharatayaśca nijanijakāraṇodbhūtā api kālavasādamarṣasthairyasavāviparyaye 'pacīyanta” iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1100: anukāryarāmādigato rasa ityuktapakṣo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1105: layo nāma nṛttagītavādyānāmekatānatārūpaṃ sāmyaṃ rasasya naṭe siddhatvena tadupayogilayādyanusaraṇaṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1112_1: rāmaḥ sukhīti smṛtivilakṣaṇā sthāyini pratītigocaratayāsvādarūpā pratipattiranu kartrālambanā
GK16andhvc2u:1114: kiṃ tvanukāryābhinnābhimate nartake āsvādayitā sāmājika ityetāvanmātramadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1115: tena nāṭya eva bālapriyā tadbhāve ityanuṣajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1117: rāmāderiva sāmājikasyāpi ratyādirūparasotpattau camatkāro na jāyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1135: sthāyino rāmādivyaktiviśeṣavṛttitvavaiśiṣṭyamavabudhya naṭena tadanukāre kriyamāṇe tathaiva sāmājikānāṃ pratītyā tasya taṭasthatvena caturvargopāyavyutpatteranudayādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1136: anena sthāyyanukāro rasa iti pakṣo 'pyayukta iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:1164: tathāvidhapratītirūparasasya nartakaviśeṣyakatvānnartake viśeṣyatāsambandhena satvātsa evāśraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1168: anye tu---anukartari yaḥ sthāyyavabhāso 'bhinayādisāmagpyādikṛto bhittāvivaharitālādinā aśvāvabhāsaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1169: sa eva lokātītatayāsvādāparasaṃjñayā pratītyā rasyamāno rasa iti nāṭyādrasā nāṭyarasāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1170: apare punarvibhāvānubhāvamātrameva viśiṣṭasāmagapyā samarpyamāṇaṃ tadvibhāvanīyānubhāvanīyasthāyirūpacittavṛttyucitavāsanānuṣaktaṃ svanirvṛticarvaṇāviśiṣṭameva rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1180: astu vātra nāṭyādvicitrarūpā rasapratītiḥ; upāyavailakṣaṇyādiyameva tāvadatra saraṇiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1181: evaṃ sthite prathamapakṣa bālapriyā nāṭye iti chedaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1183: rāmādigatasthāyino 'nukāre naṭe sthāyyavabhāso mithyājñānarūpaḥ sāmājikānāṃ jāyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1184: sa eva camatkārakārī rasa iti kecittanmatamāha----anya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1200: tābhyāṃ vibhavānubhavābhyāṃ kramādvibhāvaniyā anubhāvanīyā ca yā ratyādisthāyirūpacittavṛtyucitā vāsanā sāmājikagatā tadanuṣaktaṃ tatsambaddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1202: svasya sāmājikasya nirvṛtirūpā yā carvaṇā tadviśiṣṭaṃ tadviṣayabhūtam /
GK16andhvc2u:1205: 'śuddhaṃ vibhāvam' ityādau sarvatra rasamāhurityasya sambandho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1207: “svabhāvābhinayopetaṃ na nāstrīpuruṣāśrayaṃ nāṭyaṃ lokadharmi” “svarālaṅkārasaṃyuktamasvasthapuruṣāśrayaṃ nāṭyaṃ nāṭyadharmi” tatsthānīyena tattulyena /
GK16andhvc2u:1213: alaukiko laukikaśabdavyatiriktaḥ prasanno madhura ojasvī ca yaḥ śabdaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1227: kiṃ tu yathā pratītimātratvenāviśiṣṭatve 'pi prātyakṣikī ānumānikī āgamotthā pratibhānakṛtā yogipratyakṣajā ca pratītirupāyavailakṣṇyādanyaiva,
GK16andhvc2u:1230: rasāḥ pratīyanta iti odanaṃ pacatītivadyvavahāraḥ pratīyamāna eva hi rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1232: sā ca nāṭye laukikānumānapratītervilakṣaṇā; tāṃ ca pramukhe upāyatayā sandadhānā /
GK16andhvc2u:1233: evaṃ kāvye anyaśābdapratītervilakṣaṇā, tāṃ ca pramukhe upāyatayāpekṣamāṇā /
GK16andhvc2u:1235: rāmādicaritaṃ tu na sarvasya hṛdayasaṃvādīti mahatsāhasam /
GK16andhvc2u:1248: piśāco hi viśiṣyājñātatvenātrāyaṃ viśāca ityādi lokavyavahārānarhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1262: pakvastaṇḍulo hyodanapadārtha iti tadvayavahāro yathā aupacārikaḥ, tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1270: laukikī yā anumānena pratītiḥ dhūmādiliṅgakavahnyādyanumitiḥ, tadvilakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1292: kimetadapūrvam? kāvyaṃ ca rasān prati bhāvakamiti yaducyate, bālapriyā ityuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1295: tathāca lokottaracariteṣvapi sahṛdayānāṃ hṛdayasaṃvādo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1300: bhojarājena sūtradvayamidamitthaṃ vivṛtam--iha nānāyoniṣu bhramatāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ kāñcidyonimanubhūya yadā yonyantarasahasravyavadhānena punastāmeva yoniṃ pratipadyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1301_0: tadā tasyāṃ pūrvānubhūtāyāṃ yonau tathāvidhaśarīrādivyañjakāpekṣayā yā vāsanāḥ prakaṭībhūtā
GK16andhvc2u:1302: jātideśakālavyavadhāne 'pi tāsāṃ svanurūpasmṛtyādiphalasādhane ānantaryaṃ nairantaryaṃ kutaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1310: bhavatvānantaryaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vāsanānāṃ; yadā tu prathamamevānubhavaḥ pravartate,
GK16andhvc2u:1311: tadā kiṃ vāsanānimitta uta nirnimitta iti śaṅkāṃ vyapanetumāha--'tāsāṃ'vāsanānāṃ 'anāditva' masti, kutaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1312: 'āśiṣo nityatvāt' seyamāśīrmahāmoharūpā sadaiva sukhasādhanāni me bhūyāsurmā kadācana tairme viyogo 'bhūditi yaḥ saṅkalpaviśeṣo vāsanānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ nityatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1313: etaduktaṃ bhavati---kāraṇasya sannihitatvādanubavasaṃskārādīnāṃ kāryaṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kena vāryata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1332: kiñca bhāvakatvasvīkāre raso notpadyata iti bhavadīyapratijñāyā bhaṅge 'pyāpatati ityāha---kāvyaṃ cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1336: locanam tatra bhavataiva bhāvanādutpattipakṣa eva pratyujjīvitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1342: tasmādvayañjakatvākhyena vyāpārema guṇālaṅkāraucityādikayetikartavyatayā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ rasān bhāvayati,
GK16andhvc2u:1343: iti tryaṃsāyāmapi bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇāṃśe dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1344: tacacedaṃ bhogakṛttvaṃ rasasya dhvananītyatve siddhe daivasiddham /
GK16andhvc2u:1362: itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ prayājādikriyākalāpaśca itikartavyatātvena tasyāṃ bhāvanāyamanvetīti mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1363: tathā ca yajetetyādivaidikavākyaṃ svargamudṛsya puruṣaṃ prati vidhāyakatvena yathā bhāvakaṃ yāgena karaṇena prayājādītikartavyatayā svargārthinaḥ svargaṃbhāvayati,
GK16andhvc2u:1364: tathā kāvyaṃ bhāvakaṃ vyañjakatvavyāpāreṇa karaṇena guṇālaṅkāraucityādirūpayā itikartavyatayā sagṛdayasya rasaṃ bhāvayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1366: kartavyatayāḥ prakāra iti kartavyatā, upakārakamiti yāvaditi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1376: kriyata evetyarthaḥ. nana kriyata iti vā pāṭhaṃ(?) viśeṣamāha--api tvityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1377: 'api tu bhoge kartavye lokottaro dhvananavyāpāra eva mūrdhābhiṣikta' iti samābandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1379: dhanaṃ nibiḍaṃ yanmeharūpamāndhyamajñānaṃ tena yā saṅkaṭatā ānandāṃśasyāvṛtatvaṃ tasyā nivṛtitirbhañjanaṃ taddvāreṇetyathaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1384: rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyamarthamanuvartamānā yatra śabdārthālaṅkārā guṇāśca parasparaṃ dhvanyapekṣayā vibhinnarūpā vyavasthitāstatra kāvye dhvaniriti vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1389: yathā rāmastathāhamityupamānātiriktāṃ rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvijṛmbhārūpāṃ vyutpattimante karotīti kamupālabhāmahe /
GK16andhvc2u:1390: tasmātsthitametat---abhiviyajyante rasāḥ pratītyaiva ca rasyanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1400: rasyamānatayā hetunā udito yaścamatkāraḥ camatkāratmakaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tadanatiriktatvāttabhinnatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1419: iti yadupamānamityākārikā yā upamitiḥ sādṛśyadhīḥ śāstretihāsābhyāṃ kriyamāṇā tadatiriktāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1422: rasāsvādopāyabhūtā svasya pratipattuḥ yā pratibhā tasyā vijṛmbho vikāsastadrūpāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1425: punaḥ punaḥ kāvyapariśīlane hi rasāsvādopāyasvapratibhāvikāso bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1426: ante karotītyanenādāvuktopamitirūpāṃ vyutpattiṃ ci karotīti jñāpyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1439: kāvye tasminn alaṅkāro rasādir iti me matiḥ // DhvK_2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:1443_0: yadyapi rasavadalaṅkārasyānyairdarśito viṣayastathāpi yasmin kāveya pradhānatayānyo
GK16andhvc2u:1443_1: 'rtho vākyārthībhūtastasya cāṅgabhūtā ye rasādayaste rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayā iti māmakīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1444: tadyathā cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc2u:1447: me matirityanyapakṣaṃ dūpyatvena hṛdi nidhāyābhīṣṭatatvātsvapakṣaṃ pūrvaṃ darśayati--tathāpiti /
GK16andhvc2u:1448: sa hi paradarśito viṣayo bhāvinītyānopapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1449: yasmin kāvye iti spaṣṭatvenāsaṅgataṃ vākyamitthaṃ yojanīyam--yasmin kāvye te pūrvoktā rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā vākyārthībhūtaścānyo 'rthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1451: tasya kāvyasya sambandhino ye rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtāste rasāderalaṅkārasya rasavadādyalaṅkāraśabdasya viṣayāḥ;
GK16andhvc2u:1457: bhāmahābhiprāyeṇa cāṭuṣu preyolaṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta itīdamekaṃ vākyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1472: tasya cāṅgabhūtā ityatra tatpadena kāvyasyaiva parāmṛśyatayā yathāśrute tadarthasya tannirūpitāṅgatvasya rasādāvasambhavenāsaṅgatārthakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1474: te rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā ityasya pūrvavākye 'pi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1482: tathāca tasyeti ṣaṣṭhyantārthasya kāvyasambandhitvasya rasādāvanvayānnāsaṅgatārthakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1488: cāṭuṣvityādi dṛśyanta ityantamekaṃ vākyamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1493: locanam tatra preyānalaṅkāro yatra sa preyolaṅkāro 'laṅkaraṇīya ihoktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1497: udbhaṭamatānusāriṇastu bhaṅktvā vyācakṣate---cāṭuṣu cāṭuviṣaye vākyarthatve cāṭūnāṃ vākyārthatve preyolaṅkārasyāpi viṣaya iti pūrvoṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1498: udbhaṭamate hi bhāvālaṅkāra eva preya ityuktaḥ, premṇā bhāvānāmupalakṣaṇāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1500: rasavacchabdena preyaḥśabdena ca sarva eva rasavadādyalaṅkārā upalakṣitāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1501: tadevāha---rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyanta iti uktaviṣaya iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1504: adya yā mama govinda jātā tvayi gṛhāgate //
GK16andhvc2u:1508: cāṭusthale 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇyamānanarapatiprabhāvādereva vākyārthatā na tu preyorūpālaṅkārasyetyataḥ tatpadaṃ bahuvrīhitvāśrayeṇa vyācaṣṭe---preyānityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1514: aho narapateḥ prabhāvo yenaivaṃ durdaśā ripustrijano 'nubhavatīti prabhāvālambitāyāḥ prīteḥ ripustrījanavṛttāntaviṣayakatvāccamatkāritvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1535: anubhāvādītyādiśabdena vibhāvavyabhicārisvaśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamatra bhāvanāmalaṅkārateti ca tadvyākhyātā pratīhārendurājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1539: sa ca rasādiralaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇī vā /
GK16andhvc2u:1540: tatrādyo yathā--- kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaścirādṛrśanaṃ keyaṃ niṣkaruma pravāsarucitā kenāsi dūrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1541: svapnānteṣviti te vadan priyatamavyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā roditi riktabāhuvalayastāraṃ ripustrījanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1545: rasāntareṇāṅgabhūtenālaṅkārāntarema vā na miśraḥ, ābhiśrastu saṅkīrṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1553: svapnānteṣu svapnāyiteṣu suptapralatiteṣu punaḥpunarudbhūtatayā bahuṣviti vadanyuṣmākaṃ sambandhī ripustrījanaḥ bālapriyā prayeśśabdeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:1564: sa eva preyolaṅkāraḥ; cāṭusthale 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau cāṭurvākyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1565: tatra rasavadalaṅkāraḥ bhāvālaṅkāraśca sta ityudabhaṭamatānurodhena paṅktyartha iti sārārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1587: locanam priyatame viśeṣemāsaktaḥ kaṇṭhagraho yena tādṛśa eva san buddhvā śūnyavalayākārīkṛtabāhupāśaḥ san tāraṃ muktakaṇṭhaṃ roditīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1588: atra śokasthāyibhāvena svapnadarśanoddīpitena karuṇarasena carvyamāṇena sundarībhūto narapatiprabhāvo bhātīti karuṇaḥ śuddha evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1589: na hi tvayā ripavo hatā iti yādṛganalaṅkṛto 'yaṃ vākyārthastādṛgayam,
GK16andhvc2u:1592: candrādinā vastunā tathā vastvantaraṃ vadanādyalaṅkriyate tadupamitatvena cārutayāvabhāsāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1593: tathā rasenāpi vastu vā rasāntaraṃ vopaskṛtaṃ sundaraṃ bhāti iti rasasyāpi vastuna ivālaṅkāratve ko virodhaḥ?
GK16andhvc2u:1597: rasenāpi tarhi sarasīkriyate so 'rtha iti svasaṃvedyametat /
GK16andhvc2u:1598: tena yatkecidacūcudan--'atra rasena vibhāvādīnāṃ madhye kimalaṅkriyate' iti tadanabhyupagamaparāhatam;
GK16andhvc2u:1600: asyārthasya bhūyasā lakṣye bālapriyā bahuṣviti bahuvacanārthavivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:1603: 'atra narapatiprabhāvaḥ tathāvidhena karuṇarasena sundarībhūto bhātī'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1629: 'kiṃ hāsyene'tyādau varṇitena ripustrījanavṛttāntena taddhetubhūtapriyatamavināśapratyāyanadvārā narapatiprabhāvaḥ pratyāyyata iti sa eva prastutārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1633: saṅkīrṇo rasādiraṅgabhūto yathā---- kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadārno 'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa /
GK16andhvc2u:1638: avadhūta iti na pratīpsitaḥ bālapriyā kṣipta ityādyamarukastham /
GK16andhvc2u:1640: āliṅganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1641: ityatra tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatver irṣyāvipralambhasya śloṣasahitasyāṅgabhāva iti,
GK16andhvc2u:1643: ata eva cerṣyāvipralambhakaruṇayoraṅgatvena vyavasthānātsamāveśo na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1646: kāmīvetyanenopamānena śloṣānugṛhītenerṣyāvipralambho ya ākṛṣṭastatya śleṣopamāsahitasyāṅgatvam, na kevalasya /
GK16andhvc2u:1647: yadyapyatra karuṇo raso vāstavo 'pyasti tathāpi sataccārutvapratītyai na vyāpriyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa śleṣasahitasyetyetāvadevā vocat na tu karumasahitasyetyapi /
GK16andhvc2u:1650: yato 'tra vipralambhasyālaṅkāratvaṃ na tu vākyārthatā, ato hetorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1652: yadi hyanyatarasya rasasya prādhānyamabhaviṣyanna dvitīyo rasaḥ samāviśet /
GK16andhvc2u:1654: sa ca śokasthāyibhāvatvena nirapekṣabhāvasya karuṇasya viruddha eva /
GK16andhvc2u:1655: evamalaṅkāraśabdaprasaṅgena samāveśaṃ prasādhya bālapriyā 'śarāgniḥ vaḥ duritaṃ dahatvi'ti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1656: sa kaḥ? ya ārdraḥ tatkalabhavaḥ aparādho yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1690: tatra sarvāsāmalaṅkṛtīnāmityasya yatra hi rasasya vākyārthībhāvastatra kathamalaṅkāratvam?
GK16andhvc2u:1691: alaṅkāro hi cārutvahetuḥ prasiddhaḥ; na tvasāvātmaivātmanaścārutvahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1694: locanam evaṃvidha eveti yaduktaṃ tatraivakārasyābhiprāyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc2u:1696: athaṃ bhāvaḥ---upamādīnāmalaṅkāratve yādṛśī vārtā tādṛśyeva rasādīnām /
GK16andhvc2u:1734: teṣāṃ yadaucityaṃ tatsūcanātmatayā tatsūcanasvabhāvakatayā tattadalaṅkārā hyasyethaṃ cittavṛttiruciteti sūcayanti;
GK16andhvc2u:1735: yathā yuvajanaśarīragatā hārakaṭakakuṇḍalādayaḥ tadrāgitvasyaucityaṃ yattiśarīragatā daṇḍakaṣāyavastrādayastadvairāgyasyaucityaṃ ceti tatsūcakatvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1737: tasmādyatra rasādayo vākyārthībhūtāḥ sa sarvaḥ na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:1740: yatra tu prādhānyenārthāntarasya vākyārthībhāve rasādibhiścārutvaniṣpattiḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvc2u:1742: evaṃ dhvanerupamādīnāṃ rasavadalaṅkārasya ca vibhaktaviṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1743: yadi tu cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo rasādyalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate locanam śavaśarīraṃ kuṇḍalādyupetamapi na bhāti,
GK16andhvc2u:1746: na hi dehasya kiñcidanaucityamiti vastuta ātmaivālaṅkāryaḥ, ahamalaṅkṛta ityabhimānāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1747: rasāderalaṅkāratāyā iti vyadhikaraṇaṣaṣṭhyau, rasāderyālaṅkāratā tasyāḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1748: etadanusāreṇaiva pūrvatrāpi vākyeyojyam, rasādikartṛkasyālaṅkaraṇakriyātmano viṣaya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1752: yatra rasasyālaṅkāryatā rasāntaraṃ cāṅgabhūtaṃ nāsti tatra śuddhā evopamādayaḥ tena saṃsṛṣṭyā nopamādīnāṃ viṣayāpahāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1760: yaterātmanaśca rāgitvamanucitamityato yatiśarīragatāḥ kaṭakādayo hāsyāvahā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1761: tattaccetanaśarīragataiḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādibhiḥ sūcyasya rāgitvādicittavṛttiviśeṣasya tattaccetanocitatve teṣāmalaṅkāratā,
GK16andhvc2u:1766: na tu samānādhikaraṇe tatpade iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1768: rasādiniṣṭhā yā alaṅkāratā alaṅkriyākartṛtvaṃ rasādikartṛkālaṅkriyeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:1769: sa eva tasyā viṣaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1770: sa iti vṛttisthasyānuvādaḥ, yatretyasya pratinirdeśaḥ tatkāvyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1773: sa sarvo na rasāderalaṅkārasya viṣaya iti vākya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1781: bhāvasyāparāṅgatve bhāvālaṅkāraḥ, sa eva preyasvī preyāniti cocyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1783: locanam tatra bhāvālaṅktārasya śuddhasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā--- tava śatapatrapatramṛdutāmratalaścaramaścalakalahaṃsanūpurakaladhvaninā mukharaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1784: mahiṣamahāsurasya śirasi prasabhaṃ nihitaḥ kanakamahāmahīdhragurutāṃ kathamamba gataḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1787: rasābhāsasyālaṅkāratā yathā mamaiva stotre--- samastaguṇasampadaḥ samamalaṅkriyāṇāṃ gaṇair-- bhavanti yadi bhūṣaṇaṃ tava tathāpi no śobhase /
GK16andhvc2u:1788: śivaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ yadi yathā tathā rañjayeḥ tadeva nanu vāṇi te bhavati sarvalalokottaram //
GK16andhvc2u:1789: atra hi parameśastutimātraṃ vācaḥ paramopādeyamiti vākyārthe śṛṅgārābhāsaścārutvahetuḥ śloṣasahitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1790: na hyayaṃ pūrṇaḥ śṛṅgāro nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:1797: śatapatraṃ pajhaṃ, tasya patramiva mṛṭu tāmraṃ ca talamadhobhāgo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1798: calakalahaṃsatulyo nūpuraḥ tasya dhvaninā mukharaḥ sa śabdaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1801: kanakamayo mahāṃśca yo mahīdhraḥ parvataḥ sumeruḥ tasya /
GK16andhvc2u:1810: tathāpi mṛdutāmratala ityetāvanmātroktāvapi vitarkādeḥ sambhavādupamāyāstadaṅgatvābhāvāttadasaṅkīrṇatvarūpaṃ śuddhatvaṃ sughaṭam /
GK16andhvc2u:1813: nanu vāṇi ! samastānāṃ guṇānāṃ mādhuryādīnāmatha ca saundaryādīnāṃ sampadaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1816: tava bhūṣaṇaṃ bhavanti yadi yadyapi, tathāpi tvaṃ no śobhase /
GK16andhvc2u:1827: nāyikāyā nirguṇatve niralaṅkāratve ca sati śṛṅgāraḥ pūrṇo na bhavati,
GK16andhvc2u:1828: ato 'yaṃ tarhyupamādīnāṃ praviralaviṣayatā nirviṣayatā vābhihitā syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1830: atha satyāmapi tasyāṃ yatrācetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāvo nāsau rasavadalaṅkārasya viṣaya ityucyate /
GK16andhvc2u:1831: tat mahataḥ kāvyaprabandhasya rasanidhānabhūtasya nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:1833: bhāvābhāsāṅgatā yathā--- sa pātu vo yasya hatāvaśeṣāstattulyavarṇāñjanarañjiteṣu /
GK16andhvc2u:1838: parasya cāyamāśayaḥ---acetanānāṃ cittavṛttirūparasādyasambhavāttadvarṇane rasavadalaṅkārasyānāśaṅkyatvāttadvibhakta evopamādīnāṃ viṣaya iti /
GK16andhvc2u:1846: yatra hi rasastatrāvaśyaṃ rasavadalaṅkāra iti paramatam /
GK16andhvc2u:1847: tato na rasavadalaṅkāraścennūnaṃ tatra raso nāstīti paramatābhiprāyānnīrasatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc2u:1858: tatrrāsasya bhagavatprabhāvavibhāvitāyāṃ ratau guṇībhāvādbhāvābhāsa ūrjasvyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1883: mata iti taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā kṣubhitavihagaśreṇiraśanā vikarṣantī phenaṃ vasanamiva saṃrambhaśithilam /
GK16andhvc2u:1884: yathāviddhaṃ yāti skhalitamabhisandhāya bahuśo nadīrūpeṇeyaṃ dhruvamasahanā sā pariṇatā //
GK16andhvc2u:1885: yathā va--- tanvī meghajalārdrapallavatayā dhautādharevāśrubhiḥ śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakālavirahādviśrāntapuṣpodnamā /
GK16andhvc2u:1887: taraṅgā eva bhrūbhaṅgā yasyāḥ vikarṣantāṃ vilambamānaṃ balādākṣipantī /
GK16andhvc2u:1891: atha ca madviyogapaścāttāpā sahiṣṇustāpaśāntaye nadībhāvaṃ gateti /
GK16andhvc2u:1904: iyaṃ na nadī, kintu sā iti sambhāvayāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1917: evaṃ kṣubhitavihāgaśreṇireva raśanā yasyā iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:1928: ata eva pādapatitaṃ māmavadhūya tiraskṛtya sthitā /
GK16andhvc2u:1934: meghajālairārdrāḥ pallavā yasyāṃ tasya bhāvaḥ tattā,
GK16andhvc2u:1935: tayā hetunā aśrubhiḥ dhautaḥ adharo yasyāḥ sā iva /
GK16andhvc2u:1939: cintā maunamivāśritā madhukṛtāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sa //
GK16andhvc2u:1940: yathā vā---- teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdāṃ rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇāṃ kṣemaṃ bhadra kalindaśailatanayātīre latāveśmanām /
GK16andhvc2u:1941: vicchinne smaratalpakalpanamṛducchedopayoge 'dhunā te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalannīlatviṣaḥ pallavāḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:1943: kimiti pādapatitamapi dayitamavadhūtavatyahamiti ca cintayā maunam /
GK16andhvc2u:1945: etau ślokau nadīlatāvarṇanaparau tātparyeṇa purūravasa unmādākrāntasyoktirūpau /
GK16andhvc2u:1947: he bhadra ! teṣamiti ye mamaiva hṛdaye sthitāsteṣām /
GK16andhvc2u:1951: kalindaśailatanayā yamunā tasyāstīre latāgṛhāṇāṃ kṣemaṃ kuśalamiti kākvā praśnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1952_1: dvārakāgato bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ---smaratalpasya madanaśayyāyāḥ kalpanārthaṃ mṛdu sukumāraṃ
GK16andhvc2u:1953: atha ca smaratalpe yatkalpanaṃ klṝptiḥ sa eva mṛduḥ sukumāra utkṛṣṭaśchedopayogastroṭanaphalaṃ tasminvicchinne /
GK16andhvc2u:1964: gopeti gopadarśanena prabuddhā udbuddhāḥ saṃskārāḥ latāveśmādyanubhavajanitāḥ saṃskārā yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1981: svasya gopīnāṃ ca yaḥ ityevamādau viṣaye 'cetanānāṃ vākyārthībhāve 'pi cetanavastuvṛttāntayojanāstyeva /
GK16andhvc2u:1983: tadevaṃ satyupamādayo nirviṣayāḥ praviralaviṣayā vā syuḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1986: mayi tu sannihite 'navaratakathitopayogānneme jarājīrṇatākhilīkāraṃ kadācidavāpnuvantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1992: nanu yatra cetanavṛttasya sarvathā nānupraveśaḥ sa upamāderviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyāha--yasmādityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:1995: atijaḍo 'pi candrodyānaprabhṛtiḥ svaviśrānto 'pi varṇyamāno 'vaśyaṃ cittavṛttivibhāvatāṃ tyaktvā bālapriyā parasparālambano 'nurāgaḥ tanniścayagarbhamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:1996: tanniścayābhāve vakṣyamāṇamanupaṃpannaṃ bhavet gopīnāṃ puruṣāntararamaṇe tadupayogasambhavāditi /
GK16andhvc2u:2001: anavarato yaḥ kathitopayogaḥ pūrvoktopayogaḥ tasya yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:2020: 'yatrāntato vibhāvatvena cetanavastuvṛttāntayojanā nāsti asāvacetanavastuvṛttānto nāstī'ti vṛttānvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2032: yaḥ punaraṅgī raso bhāvo vā sarvākāramalaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvanerātmeti /
GK16andhvc2u:2035: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:2036: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvK_2.6 //
GK16andhvc2u:2040: yetamarthaṃ rasādilakṣaṇamaṅginaṃ santamavalambante te gumāḥ śauryādivat /
GK16andhvc2u:2042: locanam kāvye 'nākhyeya eva syāt; śāstretihāsayorapi vā /

GK16andhvc2u:3278: tattu sūktitasahasradyotitātmānāṃ mahātmanāṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇamātmana eva dūṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na vibhajya darśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3279_0: kiṃ tu rūpakāderalaṅkāravargasya yeyaṃ vyañjakatve rasādiviṣaye lakṣaṇadigdarśitā
GK16andhvc2u:3279_2: locanam pāṇḍamnā tanimnā kaṇṭakitatvena ca yogāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3284: ekasthasādṛśyābhāve ha dolāyamāno 'haṃ sarvatra sthito na kutracidekasya dhṛtiṃ labha iti bhāva /
GK16andhvc2u:3286: yo hi kātarahṛdayo bhavatināsau sarvasvamekasthaṃ dhārayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3294: yathā mamaiva--śītāṃśoramṛtacchaṭā yada karāḥ kasmānmano me mṛśaṃ bālapriyā gamyaṃ darśayati---pāṇḍimnetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3319: me manaḥ dhvanerātmānamupanibadhnāti sukaviḥ samāhitacetāstādā tasyātmalābho bhavati mahīyāniti /
GK16andhvc2u:3327: kiṃ prāṇānna harantyuta priyatamāsañjalpamantrākṣarai- rakṣyante kimu mohamemi hahahā no vejhi keyaṃ gatiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3330: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācyadhvaneḥ prathamaṃ bhedamalakṣyakramaṃ vicāryaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhedaṃ vibhaktumāha---krameṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3336: kālakūṭānāṃ paṭalyā samūhena yaḥ saṃvāsaḥ dvayorekotpannatvātsahavāsaḥ saṃsargaṃ iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:3338: tarhi te kiṃ kutaḥ prāṇānna haranti? prāṇāpahārakatvasyāpi tatsvabhāvatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3341: priyatamāyāḥ sañjalpeṣu yāni mantrākṣarāṇi viṣāpahārīṇi taiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3350: athetyādinā punarupādānaṃ, tathā sandūṣitatvasandehasya 'kiṃ prāṇāni'tyādinā tyāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3351: utetyādinā punarupādanamevaṃ priyatametyādi nidarśanāyāḥ, mohaṃ mūrcchāmemi prāpnomītyanena tyāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3353: kā no vejhi na jānāmītyanena punarupādānaṃ ca pratyāyyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3354: yadvā sampluṣyantītyantena rūpakasyāharantītyantena sandehasya, emītyantena nidarśanāyāśca tyāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3358: yataḥ krameṇa bhāti, ato 'nusvānasannibha ityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3359: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneḥ saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyatvādanuraṇana- prakhyo ya ātmā so 'pi śūbdaśaktimūlo 'rthaśaktimūlaśceti dviprakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3360: nanu śabdaśaktyā yatrārthāntaraṃ prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāra ucyate tadidānīṃ śleṣasya viṣaya evāpahṛtaḥ syāt, nāpahṛta ityāha---
GK16andhvc2u:3363: yasminn anuktaḥ śabdena śabda-śakty-udbhavo hi saḥ // DhvK_2.21 //
GK16andhvc2u:3367: yasmādalaṅkāro na vastumātraṃ yasmin kāvye śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa śabdaśaktyudabhavo dhvaniratyasmākaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc2u:3369: yathā--- yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścedvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3383: balino dānavānyo jayati tādṛgyena kāyo vapuḥ purāmṛtaharaṇakāle strītvaṃ prāpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3387: yaścāgaṃ govardhanaparvataṃ gāṃ ca bhūmiṃ pātālagatāmadhārayat /
GK16andhvc2u:3388: yasya ca nāma stutyamṛṣaya āhuḥ kiṃ tat?
GK16andhvc2u:3390: tasya śiroharo bālapriyā anusvānapadārthaṃvivṛṇvaṃstadbhānasya kramikatvaṃ darśayanti---ghaṇṭāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3391: vivakṣitānyaparavācya ityasya sthāne 'avivakṣitavācya' iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3401: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3404: tadayamarthaḥ--yatra śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntaraṃ vācyaṃ satpratibhāsate sa sarvaḥ śleṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3405: yatra tu śabdaśaktyā sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ vācyavyatiriktaṃ vyaṅgyamevālaṅkārāntaraṃ prakāśate sa dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3406: śabdaśaktyā sākṣādalaṅkārāntarapratibhā yathā--- tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargādeva hāriṇau /
GK16andhvc2u:3408: atra śṛṅgāravyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣādvirodhālaṅkāraśca pratibhāsata iti virodhacchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3411: sa tvāṃ mādhavo viṣṇuḥ sarvadaḥ pāyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3412: kīdṛk? andhakanāmnāṃ janānāṃ yena kṣayo nivāso dvārakāyāṃ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3413: yadi vā mausale iṣīkābhisteṣāṃ kṣayovināśo yena kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3414: dvitīyo 'rthaḥ--yena dhvastakāmena satā balijito vidhṇoḥ sambandhī kāyaḥ purā tripuranirdahanāvasare 'strīkṛtaḥ śaratvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3415: udvṛttā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya,
GK16andhvc2u:3417: yasya ca ṝṣayaḥ śaśimaccandrayuktaṃ śira āhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3418: hara iti ca yasya nāma stutyamāhuḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3419: sa bhagavānsvayamevāndhakāsurasya vināśakārī tvāṃ sarvadā kalvakālamumāyā dhavo vallabhaḥ pāyādati /
GK16andhvc2u:3420: atra vastumātraṃ dvitīyaṃ pratītaṃ nālaṅkāra iti śleṣasyaiva viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3425: mādhavasyomādhavasya ca stotavyatvena prakṛtatvāttayoḥ sāmyaṃ na vivakṣitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3435: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya tu dhvanervācyena śleṣeṇa virodhena vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3436: yathā mamaiva-- ślādhyāśeṣatanuṃ sudarśanakaraḥ sarvāṅgalīlājata- trailokyāṃ caramāravindalalitenākrāntaloko hariḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3437: bibhrāmāṃ mukhabhindurūpamakhilaṃ candrātmacakṣurdadha- tsthāne yāṃ svatanorapaśyadadhikāṃ sā rukmiṇī vo 'vatāt //
GK16andhvc2u:3439: yathā ca--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc2u:3440: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahyaṃ kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc2u:3444: apiśabdābhāve tu na tata evārthadvayasyābhidhā syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3447: yathā vismayaḥ śabdena pratibhāti vismaya ityanena śabdena tathā virodho 'pi pratibhātyapītyanena śabdena /
GK16andhvc2u:3475: ekatarasya tyāge grahaṇe vā yannimittaṃ tadabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3476: vācyatayaivetyasya vyatireka ityanenāpi sambandho vivakṣita ityāha---svatanoradhikāmitīti yathā vā---
GK16andhvc2u:3481: iti chāyā ) atra rūpakacchāyānugrāhī śleṣo vācyatayaivāvabhāsate /
GK16andhvc2u:3482: sa cākṣipte 'laṅkāro yatra punaḥ śabdāntareṇābhihitasvarūpasta na locanam bhujagaśabdārthaparyālocanābalādeva viṣaśabdo jalamabhidhāyāpi na virantumutsahate,
GK16andhvc2u:3486: nirāśīkṛtatvena khaṇḍitāni yāni mānasāni śatruhṛdayāni tānyeva kāñcanapaṅkajāni /
GK16andhvc2u:3490: evamākṣiptaśabdasya vyavacchedyaṃ pradarśyaivakārasya vyavacchedyaṃ darśayitumāha--sa ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:3493: balādevetyasya na virantumutsahate, api tvahetyanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3502: prasṛtaḥ dikṣu vyāptaḥ pratāpasāro yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3503: evaṃbhūtāḥ yasya bāhuparidhāḥ gajendrā eveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3515: ubhayorarthayoḥ pratipādane abhidhāne śaktaḥ samartho yaḥ śabdaḥ tasya prayoge sati /
GK16andhvc2u:3519: yathā--- locanam nāsti, yathā--'yena dhvastamanobhavena' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3524: yatrāpyabhidhāyā ekatra niyamahetuḥ prakaraṇādirvidyate tena dvitīyasminnarthe nābhidhā saṅkrāmati,
GK16andhvc2u:3526: tatrāpi yadi punastādṛkchabdo vidyate yenāsau niyāmakaḥ prakaraṇādiraphataśaktikaḥ sampādyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3527: ata eva sābhidhāśaktirbādhitāpi satī pratiprasūteva tatrāpi na dhvanerviṣaya iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3529: na tvasāvākṣitpaḥ, kiṃ tu śabdāntareṇānyenābhidhāyāḥ pratiprasavanādabhihitasvarūpaḥ sampannaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3532: bālapriyā ityasyānena sambandhaḥ, tasya kāraṇaṃ saṃyogādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3538: tamyā vinā ityādau camahia ityanta iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3549: sābhidhāśaktiḥ dvitīyārthābhidhānaśaktiḥ bādhitāpi bodhānanukūlākṛtāpi pratiprasūtā punarbodhānukūlā kṛtā /
GK16andhvc2u:3561: nanu śleṣasya śabdāntareṇa saleśādipadenābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati ityata āha--abhidhāyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3570: dṛṣṭyā keśava goparāgahṛtayā kiñcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK16andhvc2u:3571: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādgoṣṭhe harirvaściram //
GK16andhvc2u:3572: locanam he keśava, godhūlihṛtayā dṛṣṭyā na kiñciddṛṣṭaṃ mayā tena kāraṇena skhalitāsmimārge /
GK16andhvc2u:3573: tāṃ patitāṃ satīṃ māṃ kiṃ nāma kaḥ khalu heturyannalambase hastena /
GK16andhvc2u:3575: atra saleśaṃ sasūcanamityarthaḥ, alpībhavanaṃ hi sūcanameva /
GK16andhvc2u:3577: keśavagena uparāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyeti vā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3581: yataḥ sarvāsāmabalānāṃ madanavidhuramanasāmīrṣyākāluṣyanirāsena sevyamānaḥ san gatiḥ jīvitarakṣopāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3605: dhavalānyaṭṭāni yena sa cāsau hāsaśca dhavalāṭṭahāsaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3606: phullāḥ vikasitāḥ mallikāḥ phullamallikāḥ phullamallikānāṃ dhavalāṭṭahāso yatra sa iti vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiriti vyācṣṭe---dhavalānītyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3607: evañjātīyakaḥ sarva eva bhavatu kāmaṃ vācyaśleṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3608: yatra tu sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ sadalaṅkārāntaraṃ śabdaśaktyā prakāśate sa sarva eva dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3614: dhavalāni hṛdyānyaṭṭānyāpaṇā yena tādṛk phullamallikānāṃ hāso vikāsaḥ sitimā yatra /
GK16andhvc2u:3615: phullamallikā eva dhavalāṭṭahāso 'syeti tu vyākhyāne 'jaladabhujagajaṃ' ityetattulyametatsyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:3618: ata eva 'avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasī' iti nyāyamapākurvanto mahākālaprabhṛtayaḥ śabdā etamevārthamabhidhāya kṛta kṛtyā eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3620: atra kecinmanyante---'yeti etoṣāṃ śabdānāṃ pūrvamarthāntare 'bhidhāntaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatastathāvidhe 'rthāntare bālapriyā hāsa ityasya vyakhyānaṃ--vikāsa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3632: ṛtuvarṇanarūpaḥ ṛtuvarṇanasya vā yaḥ prastāvaḥ tena niyantritāḥ tattadartheṣu niyamitāḥ abhidhāśaktayo yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc2u:3639: kṛtādiyugasamayamupasaṃharan mallikādhavalamaṭṭahāsaṃ kurvan bhayaṅkaro mahākālaḥ mahān jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣa ityādyarthabodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3643: locanam dṛṣṭatadabhidhāśaktereva pratipatturniyantritābhidhāśaktikebhya etebhyaḥ pratipattirdhvananavyāpārādeveti śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cetyaviruddham' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3644: anye tu---'sābhidhaiva dvitīyā arthasāmarthyaṃ grīṣmasya bhīṣaṇadevatāviśeṣasādṛśyātmakaṃ sahakāritvena yato 'valamvate tato dhvananavyāpārarūpocyate' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3646: arthaśleṣe 'pi śaktibhedācchabdabheda iti darśane dvitīyaḥ śabdastatrānīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3647: sa ca kadācitabhidhāvyāpārāt yathobhayoruttaradānāya 'śvato dhāvati' iti;
GK16andhvc2u:3649: yatra tu dhvananavyāpārādeva bālapriyā arthāntare jagatsaṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣādyarthe /
GK16andhvc2u:3700: ka ito dhāvati, kiṅguṇaviśiṣṭaśceti dvayoḥ praśnayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3708: tatra śabdāntarabalādapi tadarthāntaraṃ pratintaraṃ pratipannaṃ pratiyamānamūlatvātpratiyamāmeva yuktam' iti /
GK16andhvc2u:3711: tadanantaraṃ tu tasya dvitīyārthasya pratipannasya prathamārthena prakāraṇikena sākaṃ yā rūpaṇā sā tāvadbhātyeva,
GK16andhvc2u:3719: bālapriyā yathā---“kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne 'muṣmin kimuttaram /
GK16andhvc2u:3734: pratīyamānaḥ dhvananādgamyamānaḥ śabdaḥ mūlaṃ yasya tatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3764: anyathā dvatīyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena vastudhvanivyavahāro 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3772: tatra hi dvitīyārtha eva prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3773: prathamārthastu yathā vā--- dattānandāḥ prajānāṃ samucitasamayākṛṣṭasṛṣṭeḥ payobhiḥ pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramatyahni saṃhārabhājaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3775_2: 'yaṃ śleṣo na śabdopārūḍha iti vibhinna eva śleṣādanusvānīpamavyaṅgyasya dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3778: 'tasyāvināpi' ityatrāpiśabdena 'ślādhyā' ityatrādhikaśabdena 'bhramiṃ' ityādau ca rūpakeṇāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc2u:3792: prollasan hāro yatra, prollasantī dhārā yatra ca saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3793: kālāgarūṇā sa iva ca malīmasaḥ nīlaḥ payodharaḥ stanaḥ jaladharaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:3794: tasyāḥ kāminyāḥ prāvṛṣaścā kaṃ yuvānaṃ pathikañca /
GK16andhvc2u:3796: samucitasamaye pūrvamākṛṣṭāni paścātsṛṣṭāni taiḥ dīptāṃśoḥ sūryasya pāvanānāṃ paramutkṛṣṭaṃ vartamānāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3807_1: śīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāśca śyāmāḥ pajharāgiṇyaśca dhavaladvijaśucivadanā
GK16andhvc2u:3808: atra hi vācyo virodhastacchāyānugrāhī vā śleṣo 'yamiti na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc2u:3810_0: yatra hi sākṣācchabdāvedito virodhālaṅkārastatra hi śliṣṭoktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya
GK16andhvc2u:3819: dhvalairdvijairdantaiḥ śuci nirmalaṃ vadanaṃ yāsāṃ dhavaladvijavadutkṛṣṭavipravacchuci vadanaṃ ca yāsās /
GK16andhvc2u:3821: yasyāṃ śleṣoktau kāvyarūpāyāṃ, tatra yo virodhaḥ śleṣo veti saṅkaraḥ tasya viṣayatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:3850: yathā vā mamaiva--- sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamadhīśamīśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:3852: atra hi śabdaśaktimūlānusvānarūpo virodhaḥ sphuṭameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:3854: yathā mamaiva--- khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūnatamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino locanam tatraiva virodhe śleṣe vā vācyālaṅkāratvaṃ suvacamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:3856: nanu mātaṅgetyādāvapi dharmadvaye yaścakāraḥ sa virodhadyotaka eva /
GK16andhvc2u:3857: anyathā pratadharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā na kvacidvā cakāraḥ syāt yadi samuccayārthaḥ syādityabhiprāyeṇodāharaṇāntaramāha---yatheti /
GK16andhvc2u:3859: yo na dhīśaḥ sa kathaṃ dhiyāmīśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3860: yo hariḥ kapilaḥ sa kathaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3861: caturaḥ parākramayukto yasyātmā sa kathaṃ niṣkriyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3862: arīṇāmarayuktānāṃ yo nāśayitā sa kathaṃ cakraṃ vahumānena dhārayati /
GK16andhvc2u:3867: bālapriyā tathā ca virodhaśleṣasaṅkarasya vācyālaṅkṛtitvanirūpitaṃ viṣayatvamiti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3873: mātaṅgagāminyaśśīlavatyaśca gauryo vibhavaratāścetyādau dharmadvayavācakānte yaścakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3877: anyathā cakāro yadi samuccayārthassyāttadā pratidharmaṃ sarvadharmānte vā syāt,
GK16andhvc2u:3879: sarvadharmānta ityatra sarvaśabdānta iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3889: pratīyata ityasya dhvanyata ityartha ityāha--nocyate kenaciditi /
GK16andhvc2u:3891: ye mūrdhasvavabhāsinaḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ ye cāmarāṇāṃ śirāṃ- syākrāmantyubhaye 'pi te dinapateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:3895: arthaśaktyudbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:3896: yas tātparyeṇa vastv anyad vyanakty uktiṃ vinā svataḥ // DhvK_2.22 //
GK16andhvc2u:3900: locanam nakhairudbhāsante ye 'vaśyaṃ khe gagane na udbhāsanta /
GK16andhvc2u:3908: ye kiraṇāḥ lūnaṃ vināśitaṃ tamastibhiraṃ pāpañca yaiste /
GK16andhvc2u:3912: ye kiraṇāḥ, saroruhāṇāṃ pajhānāṃ śriyaṃ kāntiṃ puṣṇanti ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3915: kṣitibhṛtāṃ parvatānām mūrdhasuśṛṅgeṣu śirassu ca ye caraṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3916: amarāṇāṃ devānām śirāṃsi ākrāmanti praṇāmakāle spṛśanti teṣvanavabhāsinaśca /
GK16andhvc2u:3919: a6 lūnatamastvādidharmaiḥ kiraṇatulyānāṃ dinapateścaraṇānāṃ gaganānudbhāsitvādibhiḥ kiraṇebhyo vyatireko dhvanita iti bodhyam // 2.1 //
GK16andhvc2u:3922: ya uktiṃ vinā svatastātparyeṇa anyadvastu vyanaktī'tyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3937: yadi lajjātmakavyabhicāripratītistarhyayamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasyaiva dhvanerviṣayo na tu vastudhvaneriti śaṅkate--'na ce'tyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:3940: yatrārthaḥ svasāmarthyādarthāntaramabhivyanākti śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaiva so 'rthaśakyudbhavo nāmānusvānopamavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3943: atra hi līlākamalapatrragaṇanamupasarjanīkṛtasvarūpaṃ śabdavyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ vyabhicāribhāvalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:3945: yato yatra sākṣācchabdaniveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:3947_0: yathā kumārasambhave madhuprasaṅge vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantyā devyā āgamanādivarṇanaṃ
GK16andhvc2u:3954: vyabhicāraṇāṃ yatrālakṣyakramatayā vyavadhivandhyaiva pratipattiḥ svavibhāvādabalāttatra sākṣācchabdaniveditatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti na pūrvāparavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3955: pūrvaṃ hyuktaṃ vyabhicāriṇāmapi bhāvatvānna svaśabdataḥ pratipattirityādi vistarataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3956: etaduktaṃ bhavati--yadyapi rasabhāvādirartho dhvanyamāna eva bhavati na vācyaḥ kadācidapi,
GK16andhvc2u:3958_0: yatra hi vibhāvānubhāvebhyaḥ sthāyigatebhyo vyabhicārigatebhyaśca pūrṇobhyo jhaṭityeva
GK16andhvc2u:3967: ityādāvityādipadena 'āvarjitā kiñcidive'tyādeḥ iha tu sāmarthyākṣiptavyabhicārimukhena rasapratītiḥ tasmādayamanyo dhvaneḥ prakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:3973: saṃmohanaṃ nāma ca puṣpadhanvā dhanuṣyamoghaṃ samadhatta bāṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:3977_0: atra hi bhagavatyāḥ prathamameva tatpravaṇatvāttasya cedānīṃ tadunmukhībhūtatvātpraṇayipriyatayā
GK16andhvc2u:3979: iha tu pajhadalagaṇanamadhomukhatvaṃ cānyathāpi kumārīṇāṃ sambhāvyata iti jhaṭiti na lajjāyāṃ viśramayati hṛdayaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:3997: sūcito yaḥ pakṣapātaḥ gāḍhībhāvadrasātmakasthāyirūpaḥ tasya vyabhicāriṇaśca,
GK16andhvc2u:4022: yatra ca śabdavyāpārasahāyo 'rthontarasya vyañjakatvenopādīyate sa nāsya dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4027: rasastvatrāpi dūrata eva vyabhicārisvarūpe paryālocyamāne bhātīti tadapekṣayālakṣyakramataiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4038: yadyapi cātra śabdāntarasannidhāne 'pa pradoṣārthaṃ prati na kasyacidabhidhāśaktiḥ padasyeti vyañjakatvaṃ na vighaṭitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4050: tarhi kathamatra lakṣyakramatvamuktamityata āha--lajjeti evaśabdaḥ kevalaśabdaśceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4055: viṭaṃ saṅketakāle mano yasya taṃ tajjijñāsum /
GK16andhvc2u:4056: ata eva hasadbhyāṃ netrābhyāmarpitaṃ sūcitaṃ ākūtaṃ saṅketakālajijñāsārūpābhiprāyo yena tam /
GK16andhvc2u:4076: śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā śabdārthaśaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśīkriyate so 'smādanusvānopamavyaṅgyāddhvaneranya evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4077: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛganyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4079: yathā kaścidāha--'gambhīro 'haṃ na me kṛtyaṃ ko 'pi veda na sūcitam /
GK16andhvc2u:4083: prakāntaprakāradvayopasaṃhāraṃ tṛtīyaprakārasūcanaṃ caikenaiva yatnena karomītyāśayena sādhāraṇamavataraṇapadaṃ prakṣipati vṛttikṛt---tathā ceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4084: tena coktaprakāradvayenāyamapi tṛtīyaḥ prakāro mantavya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4087: na dhvanirasau, api tu śleṣādiralaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4094: ataḥ me kṛtyaṃ sūcitaṃ sat ko 'pi na veda na jānāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4102: na tu vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdāntareṇa pradarśita itītyāha--ata eveti // 2.2 //
GK16andhvc2u:4109: śabdaścārthaśca śabdārthau śabdārthauca śabdārthau ca śabdārthāḥ teṣāṃ śaktetyarthātrrividho 'pi bhedassaṅgṛhīta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4118: tatra śabdaśaktyā yathā--- vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanamurujavaṃ santyajordhvapravṛttaṃ kampaḥ ko vā guruste bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
GK16andhvc2u:4119: pratyākhyānaṃ surāṇāmiti bhayaśamanacchajhanā kārayitvā yasmai lakṣmīmadvādvaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4120: locanam sa vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nyo vācyamātrālaṅkārāpekṣayā dvitīyo lokottaraścālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4124: kampo 'pāmpatiḥ ko brahmā vā tava guruḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4126: jṛmbhitaṃ ca gātrasaṃmardanātmakaṃ balaṃ bhinatti āyāsakāritvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4129: sā hi kamalā puṇḍarīkākṣameva hṛdaye nidhāyotthiteti svayameva devāntarāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:4130_1: tatsamarthācaraṇamanyatra doṣodghāṭanena atra yāhīti cābhinayaviśeṣeṇa sakalaguṇādaradarśakena kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4139: he vatse tvaṃ viṣādaṃ duḥkhaṃ mā gāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4140: ūrdhvapravṛttamurujavaṃ śvasanaṃ dīrghaśvāsaṃ santyaja saṃvṛṇviti ca pāṭhaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4167: arthaśaktyā yathā---- ambā śete 'tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasāmagraṇaritra tāto niḥśeṣāgārakarmaśramaśithilatanuḥ kumbhadāsī tathātra /
GK16andhvc2u:4168: asmin pāpāhamekā katipayadivasaproṣitaprāṇanāthā pānthāyetthaṃ taruṇyā kathitamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvam //
GK16andhvc2u:4170: locanam ityuktaprakāreṇa bhayanivāraṇavyājena surāṇāṃ pratyākhyānaṃ manthamūḍhāṃ lakṣmīṃ kārayitvā payodhiryasmai tāmadātsa vo yuṣmākaṃ duritaṃ dahatviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4172: atraikaikasya padasya vyañjaktavaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ sukalpyamiti svakaṇṭhena noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:4177: bhagavatsambandhiṣu sakalaguṇeṣu ya ādaraḥ svasya bahumatistaddarśakenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4188: niśśeṣairagārakarmabhissvayamanuṣṭhitaiḥ gṛhakarmabhiḥ yaḥ śramastena śithilā asvasthā tanuryasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc2u:4190: avasarasya tattassthale mātrādiśayanādirūpasya prastāvasya vyāhṛtiruktiḥ tasya vyājaḥ saḥ pūrvo yatra tattathā /
GK16andhvc2u:4191: atrāvayoryathākāmaṃ rantuṃ śakyaṃ ko 'pi na jānīyāt,
GK16andhvc2u:4192: tvaddarśanena kāmārtā māṃ ramaṇena prīṇayeti vaktrī bodhayatīti vaktṛvaiśiṣṭyādijñānavatāṃ sahṛdayānāṃ vyajyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4193: parantu vyaṅgyārtho yamavasaravyāhṛtivyājapūrvamiti vyājaśabdena kavinā āviṣkṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4195: ambā tāta ityābhyāṃ pitrornaisargikavātsalyaśālitvena tau mama sarvatrāpyanukūlāveveti /
GK16andhvc2u:4203: katipayetyādinā patyuracirātpratyāgamanamanāśaṅkyamiti prāṇanāthaityanena pativiṣayakānurāgābhāva iti ca dyotyata ityūhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4209: artho 'pi dvividho jñeyo vastuno 'nyasya dīpakaḥ // DhvK_2.24 //
GK16andhvc2u:4213: arthaśaktyudbhavānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye dhvanau yo vyañjako 'rtha uktastasyāpi dvau prakārau---kaveḥ kavinibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīra ekaḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4218: evamarthaśaktyudbhavasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam. śleṣādyalaṅkarebhyaścāsya vibhakto viṣaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4220: yo 'rthāntarasya dīpako vyañjako 'rtha uktaḥ so 'pi dvividhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4222: yāvattadbhedo yo dvitīyaḥ so 'pa vyañjakārthadvaividhyadvāreṇa dvividha ityapiśabdasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4225: prakarṣema ūḍaḥ sampādayitavyena vastunā prāptastatkuśalaḥ prauḍhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4244: sajjehi surahimāso ṇa dāva appei juaijaṇalakkhamuhe /
GK16andhvc2u:4247: locanam sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayati yuvatijanalakṣyamukhān /
GK16andhvc2u:4249_0: atra vasantaścetano 'naṅgasya sakhā sajjayati kevalaṃ na tāvadarpayatītyevaṃvidhayā
GK16andhvc2u:4249_1: samarpayitavyavastvarpaṇakuśalayoktyā sahakārodbhedinī vasantadaśā yata uktā ato
GK16andhvc2u:4250: anyathā vasante sapallavasahakārodgama iti vastumātraṃ na vyañjakaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4253: atra lohitaṃ bimbaphalaṃ śuko daśatīti na vyañjakatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:4254: yadā tu kavinibaddhasya sābhilāṣasya taruṇasya vakturitthaṃ prauḍhoktistadā vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc2u:4256: vṛttau---'svatassambhavī ca dvitīya' iti pāṭhaḥ kvācitkaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4258: surabhimāsaḥ vasantasambandhī māsaḥ yuvatijanā eva lakṣyāṇi yeṣāṃ tathāvidhāni mukhānyagrāṇi yeṣāṃ tān /
GK16andhvc2u:4259: lakṣasahāniti pāṭhe tāni sahante teṣveva prayojyā iti yāvattānityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4261: navāni pallavāśca patrāṇi ca tāni lānti ādadate iti tān /
GK16andhvc2u:4276: na tāvadarpayatītyanena bhaviṣyadarpaṇavyañjanadvārā manmathonmāthanasya bhavī gāḍhagāḍhī bhāvasca dyotyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4285: śukta ityasya sthāne ayaṃ śukapotaka iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4292: abbhuṭṭhāṇaṃ via mammahasya diṇṇaṃ tuha thaṇohim //
GK16andhvc2u:4293: svataḥ sambhavī ya aucatyena bahirapi sambhāvyamānasadbhāvo na kevalaṃ bhaṇitivaśenaivābhiniṣpannaśariraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4300: stanau tāvadiha pradhānabhūtau tato 'pi gauravitaḥ kāmastābhyāmabhyutthānenoparcyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4301: yauvanaṃ cānayoḥ paricārakabhāvena sthitamityevaṃvidhenoktivaicitryeṇa tvadīyastanāvaloka napravṛddhamanmathāvasthaḥ ko na bhavatīti bhaṅgyā svābhiprāyadhvananaṃ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc2u:4302: tava tāruṇyenonnatau stanāviti hi vacanena vyañjakatā /

GK16andhvc2u:4320: svataḥsambhavītyanena loke sambhāvyamāno 'pītyartho vivakṣita ityāśayena vṛttau 'ya' ityādinā vivṛtaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:4342: locanam racitāni vividhabhaṅgībhiḥ prasādhanānīta tāsāṃ sambhogavyagrimābhāvāttadviracanaśilpakauśalameva paramiti daurbhāgyātiśaya idānīmiti prakāśitam /
GK16andhvc2u:4343: garvaśca bālyāvivekādināpi bhavatīti nātra svoktisadbhāvaḥ śaṅkyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4344: eṣa cārtho yathā yathā varṇyate āstāṃ vā varṇnā,
GK16andhvc2u:4345: bahirapi yadi pratyakṣādināvalokyate tathā tathā saubhāgyātiśayaṃ vyādhavadhvā dyotayati // 2.4 //
GK16andhvc2u:4346: evamarthaśaktyudbhavo dvibhedo vastumātrasya vyañjanīyatve vastudhvanirūpatayā nirūpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4348: na kevalaṃ śabdaśakteralaṅkāraḥ pratīyate pūrvoktanītyā yāvadarthaśakterapi /

GK16andhvc2u:4370: nanu vyaṅgyo jāyāyāḥ saubhāgyātiśayo hi garvaheturityatasso 'rtho garviṇītyanenāviṣkṛta ityata āha---garvaśceti /
GK16andhvc2u:4373: svataḥsasbhavī ya aucityena bahirapi sambhāvyamānetyādyuktaṃ yojayati---eṣa cārtha ityādi //24//
GK16andhvc2u:4378: yatrāpītyapiśabdasya arthaśakterapīti alaṅkāro 'pīti yojanāṃ vikalpena darśayannāha---na kevalamityādi // 2.5 //
GK16andhvc2u:4384: sa sarvo gamyamānatvaṃ bibhrad bhūmnā pradarśitaḥ // DhvK_2.26 //
GK16andhvc2u:4388: anyatra vācyatvena prasiddho yo rūpakādiralaṅkāraḥ so 'nyatra pratīyamānatayā bāhulyena pradarśitastatrabhavadbhirbhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ /

GK16andhvc2u:4391: sarva iti pradarśita iti ca padenāsambhāvanātra mithyaivetyāha /

GK16andhvc2u:4395: tasyāḥ pāṇirayaṃ nu mārutacalatpatrrāṅguliḥ pallavaḥ ityādāvṛpamā rūpakaṃ vā dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4398: yatrālaṅkāro 'pyalaṅkārāntaraṃ dhvanati tatra vastumātreṇālaṅkāro dhvanyata iti kiyadidamasambhāvyamiti tātparyoṇālaṅkārāntaraśabdo vṛttikṛtā prayukto na tu prakṛtopayogī;
GK16andhvc2u:4400: arthaśaktyudbhave dhvanau vastvivālaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgya ityetāvataḥ prakṛtatvāt /

GK16andhvc2u:4410: ślokasyāsya sampūrṇasyānavagamādyathābhātaṃ vyākhyāyate---ayaṃ tasyāḥ pāṇiḥ pallavaḥ nu itati yojanā /
GK16andhvc2u:4429: tat-paratvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvaner mataḥ // DhvK_2.27 //
GK16andhvc2u:4432: tatparatvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ // 27 //
GK16andhvc2u:4433: alaṅkārāntareṣu tvanuraṇanarūpālaṅkārapratītau satyāmapi yatra vācyasya vyaṅgyapratipādanaunmukhyena cārutvaṃ na prakāśate nāsau dhvanermārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4434: tathā ca dīpakādāvalaṅkāre upamāyā gamyamānatve 'pi tatparatvena cārutvasyāvyavasthānānna dhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4436: candamaūehi ṇisā ṇalini kamalehi kusumagucchehi laā /

GK16andhvc2u:4463: atra gurvīkriyata ityasya candramayūkhairniśetyādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ /
