GK16andhvc2u:4472: yatra tu vyaṅgyaparatvenaiva vācyasya vyavasthānaṃ tatra vyaṅgyamukhenaiva vyapadeśo yuktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4478: tatsarvaṃ kāvyakathāyāḥ sajjanairityetāvānayamartho guruḥ kryita iti dīpakabalāccakāsti /
GK16andhvc2u:4479: kathāśabda idamāha---āsatāṃ tāvatkāvyasya kecana sūkṣmā viśeṣāḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:4481: teṣu tu satsvāste subhagaṃ kāvyaśabdavyapadeśabhāgapi śabdasandarbhamātram;
GK16andhvc2u:4482: tathā taiḥ kriyate yathādaraṇīyatāṃ pratipadyata iti dīpakasyaiva vyavacchedyabalena yo 'rtho 'bhimato yatra tatparatvaṃ sa dhvanemārga ityevaṃrūpastaṃ vyācaṣṭe---yatra tviti /
GK16andhvc2u:4484: yadi vā vācyālaṅkārasya sadbhāvamātraṃ na vyañjakatā,
GK16andhvc2u:4506: sajjaneṣu haṃsādīnāṃ kāvyakathāyāṃ niśādīnāṃ ca gamyamānāyā upamāyā na prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4510: yatretyādinā pradarśitasya vikalpena traividhyaṃ bhavatīti darśayati---tatra cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4512: yathā--- prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyā- nnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi /
GK16andhvc2u:4513: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāta- stvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4514: yathā vā mamaiva--- lāvaṇyakāntiparipūritadiṅmukhe 'smi- nsmere 'dhunā tava mukhe taralāyatākṣi /
GK16andhvc2u:4515: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāgapi tena manye suvyaktameva jalarāśirayaṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:4519: kasmiṃścidanantabalasamudāyavati narapatau samudraparisaravartini pūrṇacandrodayatadīyabalāvagāhanādinā nimittena payodhestāvatkampo jātaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4520: so 'nena sandehenotprekṣyata iti sasandehotprekṣayoḥ saṅkarātsaṅkarālaṅkāro vācyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4521: tena ca vāsudevarūpatā bālapriyā eṣāmudāharaṇāni sphuṭībhaviṣyanti /
GK16andhvc2u:4523: eṣaḥ rājā, prāptā śrīḥ sampadramā ca yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4525: manthakhedaṃ mathanahetukaṃ duḥkham kasmāt kimiti vidadhyāt kuryāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4530: asya rājñaḥ pūrvā nidrāmapyahaṃ naiva sambhāvayāmi naiva saṃśaye /
GK16andhvc2u:4533: eṣaḥ yataḥ sakaladvīpanāthairanuyātaḥ, ataḥ kimiti mayi bhūyaḥ setuṃ badhnāti /
GK16andhvc2u:4534: tvayi āyāte svasannidhimāgate sati iti vitarkān pūrvoktavākyairgamyān kiṃ mathnīyādityādisandehān /
GK16andhvc2u:4535: dadhata iva taddhāraṇādiva payodheḥ kampaḥ jalacāñcalyamatha ca vepathuḥ ābhātītyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4541: vitarkān dadhata iti vākyapratipāditena eṣaḥ kiṃ mathnīyāditi sandehena hetunetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4543: kampena kāryeṇa nimittena uktasandeharūpo hetuḥ payodhāvutprekṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4550: vīrāṇaṃ ramai ghusiṇaruṇammi ṇa tadā piāthaṇucchaṅge /
GK16andhvc2u:4553: yadyapi cātra vyatireko bhāti, tathāpi sa pūrvavāsudevasvarūpāt, nādyatanāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4554: adyatanatve bhagavato 'pi prāptaśrīkatvenānālasyena sakaladvīpādhipati vijayitvena ca vartamānatvāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4557: yo yo 'samprāptalakṣmīko nirvyājavijigīṣākrāntaḥ sa sa māṃ mathnīyādityādyarthasambhāvanāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4558: na ca punarapīti pūrvāmiti bhūya iti ca śabdairayamākṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4560: yathā pṛthvī pūrvaṃ kārtavīryeṇa jitā punarapi jāmadagnyeneti /
GK16andhvc2u:4561: pūrvā nidrā ca siddhā rājaputrādyavasthāyāmapīti siddhaṃ rūpakadhvanirevāyamiti /
GK16andhvc2u:4571: pūrvaṃ mathanodyukto nidronmukhaḥ setubandhanodyuktaśca yo vāsudevaḥ tatsvarūpādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4576: tathācaitadvacanakālīnatathāvidhavāsudevādvyatireko na bhātīti tadabhedo 'tra dhvanyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4577: nanvatra niśi vāsudevatvapratīti vinā payodheruktavitarkā na dhaṭanta ityastadvyaṅgyaṃ tadupapādakatayā guṇībhūtamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4583: vāsudeva iva asamprāptalakṣmīko yo yo janaḥ, sa sa māṃ mathnīyāt /
GK16andhvc2u:4584: nirvyājavijigoṣākrānto yo yaḥ, sa sa mayi setuṃ badhnīyādityādisaṃśayasambhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4592: kvacit granthe prāptaśrīrityasyānantaraṃ yathā vā 'jyotsnāpūre'tyādi pāṭho dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc2u:4593: sa locanam yathā ca---- jyotsnāpūraprasaradhavale saikate 'sminsarayvā vādadyūtaṃ suciramabhavatsiddhayūnoḥ kayościt /
GK16andhvc2u:4594: eko 'vādītprathamanihataṃ keśinaṃ kaṃsamanyo matvā tattavaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam //
GK16andhvc2u:4599: kāntiḥ prabhā tābhyāṃ paripūritāni saṃvibhaktani hṛdyāni sampāditāni diṅmukhāni yena /
GK16andhvc2u:4601: smereriṣadvihasanaśīle taralāyate prasādāndolanavikāsasundare akṣiṇī yasyāstasyā āmantraṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:4602: atha cādhunā na eti, vṛtte tu kṣaṇāntare kṣobhamagamat /
GK16andhvc2u:4603: kopakaṣāyapāṭalaṃ smeraṃ ca tava mukhaṃ sandhyāruṇapūrṇaśaśadharamaṇḍalameveti bhāvyaṃ kṣobheṇa calacittatayā sahṛdayasya /
GK16andhvc2u:4605: jalādayaḥ śabdā bhāvārthapradhānā bālapriyā tvapapāṭha ityāha---yathocetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4608: bhavacchabdārthasya varṇyasya rājño hananakartṛtvoktyā tasya vāsudevābhedo yataḥ sphujīkṛtastasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4615: yeṣu mukhasya svadṛṣṭidvārā sambandhastāni diṅmukhānīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4620: adhunetyasya na eti ityanenāpi sambandha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4635: kṣobhapadasya cittacāñcalyamātrārthakatve tu mukhasya saundaryātiśaya eva dhvanenna candrābhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4642: atra ca kṣobho madanavikārātmā sahṛdayasya tvanmukhāvalokanena bhavatītīyatyabhidhāyā viśrāntatayā rūpakaṃ dhvanyamānameva /
GK16andhvc2u:4643: vācyālaṅkāraścātra śleṣaḥ, sa ca na vyañjakaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4644: anuraṇanarūpaṃ yadrūpakamarthaśaktivyaṅgyaṃ tadāśrayeṇeha kāvyasya cārutvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
GK16andhvc2u:4647: vīrāṇāṃ ramate ghusṛṇāruṇe na tathā priyāstanotsaṅge /
GK16andhvc2u:4649: prasādhitapriyatamāśvāsanaparatayā samanantarībhūtayuddhatvaritamanaskatayā ca dolāyamānadṛṣṭitve 'pi yuddhe tvarātiśaya iti vyatireko vācyālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4650: tatra tu yeyaṃ dhvanyamānopamā priyākucakuṅmalābhyāṃ sakalajanatrāsakareṣvapi śātraveṣu mardanodyateṣu rājakumbhasthaleṣu bālapriyā iti /
GK16andhvc2u:4659: vyaṅgyasyoktasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvaṃ nirākurvan dhvaniṃ vyavasthāpayati--atra cetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4670: nanu vṛttau vīrāṇāmityudāharaṇayorupamādhvaniḥ svaśabdena kutato na yojita ityata āha--tulyetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4674: tathā ghusṛṇāruṇe priyāstanotsaṅge na samate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4683_1: pratipādanāt sambhogatvarāpekṣayā yuddhe tvarātiśayo gamyata iti tasya vācyāyamānatvāt vācyalaṅkāratā /
GK16andhvc2u:4684: yadvā---iti vyatireka ityasya ityarthavyañjako vyatireka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4697: iti chāyā ) ākṣepadhvaniryathā---- sa vaktumakhilān śakto hayagrīvāśritān guṇān /
GK16andhvc2u:4699: locanam tadvaśena ratimādadānānāmiva bahumāna iti saiva vīratātiśayacamatkāraṃ vidhatta ityupamāyāḥ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4702: teṣāmasurāṇāṃ pātālavāsināṃ yaiḥ punaḥ punarindrapurāvamardanādi kiṃ kiṃ na kṛtaṃ taddhṛdayamiti yattebhyastebhyo 'tiduṣkarebhyo 'pyakampanīyavyavasāyaṃ tacca /
GK16andhvc2u:4704_0: teṣāṃ ratnānāmā samantāddharaṇe ekarasaṃ tatparaṃ yaddhṛdayaṃ tatkusumabāṇena sukumārataropakaraṇasambhāreṇa
GK16andhvc2u:4709: gajakumbhasthaleṣvityasya ratimityanena bahumāna ityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4715: priyākucakuṅmalasādṛśyena gajakumbhasthaleṣu prītiṃ bibhratāṃ vīrāṇāṃ teṣu bahumatirivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4720: pratīyamāno yo bhaṭānāṃ vīryātiśayastasya yaścamatkāraḥ camatkārakāritvaṃ tamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4733: teṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadityādinā pūrvārdhabhāvārthakathanaṃ taditi śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4739: devvāettammi phale kiṃ kīrai ettiaṃ puṇā bhaṇimo /
GK16andhvc2u:4742: sakalaratnasāratulyo bimbādhara iti hi teṣāṃ bahumāno vāstava eva /
GK16andhvc2u:4756_0: ratnāharaṇe ekarasaṃ yaddhṛdayaṃ tadbimbadhare niveśitamiti vastuto bhinnayorantaḥkaraṇavṛttiviśeṣātmakayoḥ
GK16andhvc2u:4778: padaprakāśaścāyaṃ dhvaniriti vākyasyārthāntaratātparye 'pi sati na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4781: avaraddhasya vi ṇa hu de pahujāṇaa rosiuṃ sakkam //
GK16andhvc2u:4783: aparāddhasyāpi na khalu te bahujña roṣituṃ śakyam //
GK16andhvc2u:4784: iti chāyā) locanam daivāyatte phale kiṃ kriyatāmetāvatpunarbhaṇāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4786: aśokasya phalamāmrādivannāsti, kiṃ kriyatāṃ pallavāstvatīva hṛdyā itīyatābhidhā samāptaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4787: atra phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātsamarthakamasya vastunaḥ pūrvameva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4788: lokottarajigīṣātadupāyapravṛttasyāpi hi phalaṃ sampallakṣaṇaṃ daivāyattaṃ kadācinna bhavedapītyevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakam /
GK16andhvc2u:4789: nanvasya sarvavākyasyāprastutapraśaṃsā prādhānyena vyaṅgyā tatkathamarthāntaranyāsasya vyaṅgyatā,
GK16andhvc2u:4791: sarvo hi dhvaniprapañcaḥ padaprakāśo vākyaprakāśaśceti yakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:4798: atra ityevaṃrūpaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ asya vastunaḥ samarthakaṃ phalaśabdasya śaktivaśātpūrvameva pratīyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4799: daivāyatte hi phale kiṃ kriyatāmityatra phalaśabdaḥ prakaraṇavaśāt sasyarūpamarthamabhidhayā vakti,
GK16andhvc2u:4802: tataśca sarveṣāṃ sampado daivāyattāḥ kadācinna bhaveyurapīti sāmānyarūpo 'rthaḥ pūrvoktaprastutārthasya samarthako labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4803: pūrvameva pratīyate ityasya daivāyatte hi phale ityasya śravaṇakāla eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4806: upāyapravṛttasyāpi sampallakṣaṇaṃ phalamalabdhavataḥ kasyacidrājādeḥ guṇapraśaṃsārūpaḥ prastutārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4808: aprastutapraśaṃsāsthaleprastutārtho vyaṅgyaḥ, sa kvacit pradhānañceti prathamodyote uktam /
GK16andhvc2u:4815: nanvevaṃ sati kathamatra vyavahāra hatyata atra hi vācyaviśeṣeṇa sāparāghasyāpi bahujñasya kopaḥ kartumaśakya iti samarthakaṃ sāmānyamanvitamanyattātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc2u:4819: hṛdaye sthāpito na tu bahiḥ prakaṭato manyuryayā /
GK16andhvc2u:4820: ata evāpradarśitaroṣamukhīmapi māṃ prasādayan he bahujña,
GK16andhvc2u:4821: aparāddhasyāpi tava na khalu roṣakaraṇaṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4823: anantaraṃ tu tadarthaparyālojanādyatsāmānyarūpaṃ samarthakaṃ pratīyate tadeva camatkārakāri /
GK16andhvc2u:4824: sā hi khaṇḍitā satī vaidagdhyānunītā taṃ pratyasūyāṃ darśayantītthamāha /
GK16andhvc2u:4825: yaḥ kaścidbahujño dhūrtaḥ sa evaṃ sāparādho 'pi svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayatīti mā tvamātmani bahumānaṃ mithyā grahīriti /
GK16andhvc2u:4834: kasyāścidantargataroṣāyā anāviṣkṛtaroṣacihnāyāḥ kṛtāgasā vallabhena prasādyamānāyāḥ taṃ prativacanam--hṛdayetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4841: ato 'parāddhamapi tvāṃ prati roṣaṃ kartuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4865: yato bahujñāstu sāparādhā api tattadvacanena svāparādhāvakāśamācchādayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4866: anvitamityanena sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvarūpasambandho vivakṣita iti darśayati---viśeṣa ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:4871: jāejja vaṇuddese khujja vvia pāavo gaḍiavatto /
GK16andhvc2u:4872: mā māṇusammi loe tāekvaraso dariddo a //
GK16andhvc2u:4876: atra hi tyāgaikarasasya daridrasya janmānabhinandanaṃ truṭitapatrrakubjapā dapajanmābhinandanaṃ ca sākṣācchabdavācyam /
GK16andhvc2u:4877: tathāvidhādapi pādapāttādṛśasya puṃsa upamānopameyatvapratītipūrvakaṃ śocyatāyāmādhikyaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc2u:4886: vanoddeśa eva vanasyaikānte gahane yatra sphuṭatarabahuvṛkṣasampattyā prekṣate 'pi na kaścit /
GK16andhvc2u:4889: chāyāmapi na karoti tasya kā puṣpaphalavattetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4890: tādṛśo 'pi kadācidāṅgārikasyopayogī bhavedulūkādīnāṃ vā nivāsāyeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4894: yatra lokyate so 'rthibhistena cārthijano na ca kiñcicchakyate kartuṃ tanmahadvaiśasamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4896: ityasyānantaraṃ 'raktastvaṃnavapallavai'riti iti ca pāṭhaḥ kvacit dṛśyate, sa prāmādikaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4909: ahaṃ kubjaḥ galitapatraḥ pādapaḥ panoddeśe iva jāyeya /
GK16andhvc2u:4912: atra hi madhau malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākāritvaṃ manmathonmāthadāyitvenaiva /
GK16andhvc2u:4920: viṣavātena hi mūrchito bṛṃhita upacito mohaṃ karoti /
GK16andhvc2u:4921: ekaśca mūrcchitaḥ pathikamadhye 'nyeṣāmapi dhairyacyuti vidadhanmūrcchāṃ karotītityubhayathotprekṣā /
GK16andhvc2u:4923: tataḥ kiṃ? na hi hetutā paramārthataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4924: tathāpi tu hetutā utprekṣyata iti yatkiñcidetat /
GK16andhvc2u:4940: prakṛte niḥśvāsānilasya bhujagasambandhitayāviṣasamparko gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4942: tatra samucchrāyārthāprāyeṇā vyācaṣṭe---bṛṃhita iti asyaiva vivaraṇam---upacita iti /
GK16andhvc2u:4951: ubhayathotprekṣeti viṣavātopacitatvaṃ mohāvasthāprāptiśceti ye tayoḥ malayamārutasya pathikamūrcchākaraṇehetutvenotprekṣetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4966: candanāsaktabhujagānāṃ niśvāsānilaiḥ mūrcchitaḥ sambaddha iti svarūpakathanamātraparaṃ tadviśeṣaṇamato vācyārthaniṣpattirbodhyā /
GK16andhvc2u:4971: isākalusassa vi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimācando /
GK16andhvc2u:4972: ajja sarisattaṇaṃ pāviūṇa aṅge via ṇa māi //
GK16andhvc2u:4974: adya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyāṅga eva na māti //
GK16andhvc2u:4979: yadi tu prasannasya mukhasya sādṛśyamudvahetsarvadā vā tatkiṃ kuryāttvanmukhaṃ tvetadbhavatīti manorathānāmapyapathamidamityapiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4980: aṅge svadehe na mātyeva daśa diśaḥ pūrayati yataḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:4983: nanu nanuśabdena vitarkotprekṣārūpamācakṣāṇenāsambaddhatā nirākṛteti sambhāvayamāna bālapriyā 'anuraṇanarūpā' saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyā /
GK16andhvc2u:4985: śaṅkate 'na ce'tyādi 'evaṃvidhe viṣaye' iti candanāsaktetyādisthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5004: atra gamyaṃ hetumāha---daśadiśaḥ pūrayati yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5008: aṅgena bhātyevetyanena labdhaṃ svaprabhayā diśaṃ pūraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5011: tava mukhasya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyeveti mukhasādṛśyaprāptihetukatvenotprekṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5019: anubaddhaḥ yathā vā---- trāsākulaḥ paripatan parito niketān puṃbhirna kaiścidapi dhanvibhiranvabandhi /
GK16andhvc2u:5020: tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacidaṅganābhi- rākarṇapūrṇanayaneṣuhatekṣaṇaśrīḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5022: śleṣadhvaniryathā--- ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5024: atra vadhūmiḥ saha valabhīrasevanteti vākyārthapratīteranantaraṃ vadhva iva locanam udāharaṇāntaramāha--yathā veti /
GK16andhvc2u:5025: paritaḥ sarvato niketān paripatannākramanna kaiścidapi cāpapāṇibhirasau mṛgo 'nubaddhastathāpi na kvacittasthau trāsacāpalayogātsvābhāvikādeva /
GK16andhvc2u:5026: tatra cotprekṣā dhvanyate---aṅganābhirākarṇapūrṇaurnetraśarairhatār ikṣaṇaśrīḥ sarvasvabhūtā yasya yato 'to na tasthau /
GK16andhvc2u:5031: kimākārāḥ prasiddhīḥ ramyā ityevamākārāḥ viviktā janasaṅkulatvābhāvādityato heto rāgaṃ sambhogābhilāṣaṃ vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5034: yato hetoḥ viviktā vibhaktaṅgyo laṭabhāḥ yāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5040: 'na tasthāvi'tyatra vāstavo hetustrāsākula ityanena darśita ityāha---trāsetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5041: ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ karṇaparyantavyāptaiḥ ākarṇakṛṣṭaiśca netraśaraiḥ netrāṇyeva śarāstaiḥ,
GK16andhvc2u:5053: tathācoktasthale ivādiśabdābhāve 'pyutprekṣārūpārthasya sahṛdayānāṃ pratīterasambaddhatvāpādānaṃ na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5061: śleṣaśca nābhidhāvṛtterākṣiptaḥ, api tvarthasaundaryabalādeveti sarvathā dhvanyamāna eva śleṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5062: ata eva vadhva iva valabhya ityabhidadhatāpi vṛttikṛtopamādhvaniriti noktam /
GK16andhvc2u:5064: samā iti hi yadi spaṣṭaṃ bhavettadopamāyā eva spaṣṭatvācchleṣastadākṣiptaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc2u:5066: na ca tena vinābhidāyā aparipuṣṭatā kācit /
GK16andhvc2u:5067: ata eva samāptāyāmevābhidhāyāṃ sahṛdayaireva sa dvitīyo 'rtho 'pṛthakprayatnenaivāvagamyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5070: 'pīnaścaitro divā nāti' ityatrābhidhaivāparyavasiteti saiva svārthanirvāhāyārthāntaraṃ śabdāntaraṃ vākarṣatītyanumānasya śrutārthāpattervā bālapriyā samamiti śabdādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5087: yūnāṃ savadhūkānāṃ satāṃ valabhīsevanasyārthasya prakṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5096: divābhojanamakurvataḥ kutaḥ pīnatvamityākāṅkṣāsattvena śāntākāṅkṣasya bodhasyājananāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5109: madanaviśeṣaṇībhūto yo 'ṅkuritādiśabdaḥ sañjāteṣatprādurbhāvādiḥ tadarthaḥ taṭgataṃ tadāśritam /
GK16andhvc2u:5123: yathāsaṅkhyadhvaniryathā--- aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca sahakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5124: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaśca hṛdi madanaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5126: evamanye 'pyalaṅkārā yathoyogaṃ locanam tārkikamīmāṃsakayorna dhvaniprasaṅga ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc2u:5130: yathā ca dīpakadhvaniḥ-- mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madavalaḥ paraśurvā /
GK16andhvc2u:5131: vajramindrakaraviprasṛtaṃ vā svasti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa //
GK16andhvc2u:5136: priyatamena sākamudyāne viharantī kācinnāyikā bhramaramevamāheti bhṛṅgasyābhidhāyāṃ bālapriyā 'aṅkurite' iti saptamyantapāṭho 'pi pūrvārdhe dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5147: atra “yaśca nimbaṃ paraśune“tyādāviva mā bhavantamanala ityatra dhākṣīdityasya,
GK16andhvc2u:5166: pratyutāmāntraṇaṃ tasyā maugdhyavijṛmbhitamiti abhidhayā tāvannāprastutapraśaṃsā samāpyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5182: bhṛṅgavṛttāntasya yadyaprastutatvaṃ bhavetadā priyatamopālambharūpārtha eva vākyasya viśrāntyā tasyābhidhayā samāpyatvaṃ bhavet,
GK16andhvc2u:5206: yaḥ gaurāṅgīkucakumbha iva bhūriḥ subhagaścābhogo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5207: sudhādhāmani candre kālāgaruṇā yā patrabhaṅgaracanā racitaḥ patrabhaṅga iti yāvat,
GK16andhvc2u:5209: yadvā---racanāyā āvāsaḥ āspadatvaṃ tena ekena sārāyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5210: he natāṅgi sundari ! locanam vicchedānaladīpitotkavanitācetodhivāsodbhavaṃ santāpaṃ vininīṣureṣa vitatairaṅgairnatāṅgi smaraḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5213: api tu gaurāṅgīstanābhogasthānīye candramasi kālāgurupatrrabhaṅgavicchittyāspadatvena yaḥ sāratāmutkṛṣṭatāmācaratīti tanna jānīmaḥ kimetadvastviti sasandeho 'pi dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5214_3: cāṭukaṃ kurvāṇaścandravartinī ceyaṃ kuvalayadalaśyāmalakāntirevameva karotīti prativastūpamādhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5215: sudhādhāmanīti candraparyāyatayopāttamapi padaṃ santāpaṃ vininīṣurityatra hetutāmapi bālapriyā eṣa iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5218: tena dīpitāni yāni utkānāmutkaṇṭhitānāṃ vanitānāṃ cetāṃsi tadadhivāsena udbhavo yasya tam /
GK16andhvc2u:5225: nāyamaṅkaḥ, kintu tathāvidho manmatha ityapahnava ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5241: sāraḥ utkṛṣṭa ivācarati sāro bhavati iti vā vigrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5264: śobhābhiḥ saha uddīpayati iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5266: tvadīyakucaśobhā mṛgāṅkaśobhā ca saha madanamuddīpayata iti sahoktidhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5270: yataḥ--- helāpi kasyacidacintyaphalaprasūtyai kasyāpi nālamaṇave 'pi phalāya yatnaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5271: digdantiromacalanaṃ dharaṇīṃ dhunoti khātsampatannapi latāṃ calayenna bhṛṅgaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5272: eṣāṃ tu bhedānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭitva saṅkaratvaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ cintyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5273: atiśayoktidhvaniryathā mamaiva--- kelīkandalitasya vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapuste dṛśau bhaṅgībhaṅgarakāmakārbhukamidaṃ bhrūnarmakarmakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5274: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamaho vaktrāmbujanmāsavaḥ satyaṃ sundari vedhasastrijagatīsārastvamekākṛtiḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5275: atra hi madhu māsamadanāsavānāṃ trailokye subhagatānyonyaṃ paripoṣakatvena /
GK16andhvc2u:5286: he sundari ! te tava dṛśau kelīvilāsijanasya krīḍā tasyāḥ kandalaṃ navāṅkuraḥ riṣadāvirbhāva iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5288: vibhramaḥ strīṇāṃ śṛhgāraceṣṭā tatkārī vibhramaḥ śobhā,
GK16andhvc2u:5289: tacchālī vā yo madhurvasantaḥ tasya dhuraṃ kāmoddīpanādibhāraṃ vahatīti dhuryam /
GK16andhvc2u:5291: tvadīyaṃ netradvitayamacirāvirbhūtasya vasantasya kāmoddīpanādikāryakāri śarīraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5296: yadvā---bhaṅgīyuktaṃ vakraṃ ca yat kāmasya kārbhukaṃ kramikakarmaviśiṣṭaṃ dhanuḥ tadbhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5297: yadvā---idamiti bhinnaṃ padaṃ karmukaviśeṣaṇaṃ, kramikakarmaviśiṣṭamiti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5298: tathā te vaktrāmbujanmani mukhapajhe ya āsavaḥ madyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5303: ataḥ tvamekā vedhasaḥ kṛtiḥ sṛṣṭiḥ trijagatīsāraḥ trailokyasārabhūtā bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5312: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // DhvK_2.28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5315: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // 28 //
GK16andhvc2u:5316: dhvanyaṅgatā cobhābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vyañjakatvena vyaṅgyatvena ca /
GK16andhvc2u:5318: vyaṅgyatve 'pyalaṅkārāṇāṃ pradhānyavivakṣāyāmeva locanam tvayi lokottareṇa vapuṣā sambhūya sthitā ityatiśayoktirdhvanyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5319: āpāte 'pi vikārakāraṇamityāsvādaparamparākriyayāpi vinā vikārātmanaḥ phalasya sampattiriti vibhāvanādhvanirapi /
GK16andhvc2u:5325: nanuktāstāvaccirantanairalaṅkārāsteṣāṃ tu bhavatā yadi vyaṅgyatvaṃ pradarśitaṃ kimiyatetyāśaṅkyāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5326: yeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ vācyatvena śarīrīkaraṇaṃ śarīrabhūtātprastutādarthāntarabhūtatayā aśarīrāṇāṃ kaṭakādisthānīyānāṃ śarīratāpādanaṃ vyavasthitaṃ bālapriyā te madhumadanāsavāḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5329: madanadhanuṣo bhrūrūpeṇa sthityā madanasya sthitiḥ sidhyatīti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc2u:5336: dṛgdvayasya madhośca sāmyavivakṣayā dṛśau vibhramamadhordhuryaṃ vapurityuktyā “nyūnasyāpi viśiṣṭene“tyādinā bhāmahādilakṣitā tulyayogitetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5342: niyataḥ niyamitaḥ viṣayaḥ alaṅkāraviśeṣarūpāśrayo yasya tatkṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5365: locanam yadi vā vācyatve sati yeṣāṃ śarīratāpādanamapi na vyavasthitaṃ durghaṭamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5366: te 'laṅkārā dhvanervyāpārasya kāvyasya vāṅgatāṃ vyaṅgyarūpatayā gatāḥ santaḥ parāṃ durlabhāṃ chāyāṃ kāntimātmarūpatāṃ yānti /
GK16andhvc2u:5370: evambhūtā ceyaṃ vyaṅgyatā yā apradhānabhūtāpi vācyamātrālaṅkārebhya utkarṣamalaṅkārāṇāṃ vitarati /
GK16andhvc2u:5428: tadaprādhānye tu vācyālaṅkāra eva pradhānamiti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5429: nanvalaṅkāro vastunā vyajyate alaṅkārāntareṇa ca vyajyata ityatrodāharaṇāni kimiti na darśitānītyāśaṅkyāha---vastviti /
GK16andhvc2u:5442: ataḥ tatparatvena bhāvyaṃ, tathāca dhvanyaṅgatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5454: vā prakāśane cārutvotkarṣanibandhane sati prādhānye 'rthaśaktudbhavānuraṇarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniravagantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5455: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tadābhāsavivekaṃ kartumucyate--
GK16andhvc2u:5458: vācyasyāṅgatayā vāpi nāsyāsau gocaro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.31 //
GK16andhvc2u:5463: tatra ya eva sphuṭaḥ śabdaśaktyārthaśaktyā vā prakāśate sa eva dhvanermārgo netaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5466: kamalāarā ṇaṃ maliā haṃsā uḍḍāviā ṇa a piucchā /
GK16andhvc2u:5467: locanam vyañjakasya ca pratyekaṃ vastvalaṅkārarūpatayā dviprakāratvāccaturvidho 'yamathaśaktyudbhava iti tātparyam //29//
GK16andhvc2u:5476: te ca pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakayoruktabhedanayena caturdheti dvādaśavidho 'rthaśaktimūlaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5478: te ca padavākyaprakāśatvena pratyekaṃ dvividhā vakṣyante /
GK16andhvc2u:5481: bālapriyā subodhāyoktān vakṣyamāṇāṃśca dhvaniprabhedān saṅkalayyāha---avivakṣitavācyaityādinā pañjatriṃśadbhedā ityantena /
GK16andhvc2u:5489: atra padavākyaprakāśatvena bhedasyoktatvādanena varṇasaṅghaṭanāprabandhaprakāśayatvena yadbhedatrayaṃ tadeva vivakṣitaṃ,
GK16andhvc2u:5496: keṇa vi gāmataḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇaaṃ phaliham //
GK16andhvc2u:5497: atra hi pratiyamānasya mugdhavadhvā jaladharapratibimbadarśanasya vācyāṅgatvameva /
GK16andhvc2u:5498: evaṃvidhe viṣaye 'nyatrāpi yatra vyaṅgyāpekṣayā vācyasya cārutvotkarṣapratītyā prādhānyamavasīyate,
GK16andhvc2u:5504: evaṃvidho hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyodāharaṇatvena nirdakṣyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5505: locanam asyetyātmabhūtasya dhvanerasau kāvyaviśeṣo na gocaraḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5506: kamalākarā na malitā haṃsā uḍḍāyitā na ca sahasā /
GK16andhvc2u:5510: anye tu pi ucchā pitṛṣvasaḥ itthamāmantryate /
GK16andhvc2u:5513: vācyenaiva hi vismayavibhāvarūpeṇa mugdhimātiśayaḥ pratīyata iti vācyādeva cārutvasampat /
GK16andhvc2u:5524: kasyāścinmugdhāyāstaṭāke pratibimbitamabhraṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāyāḥ sakhījanaṃ pitṛṣvasāraṃ vā prati kamaletyādivacanam /
GK16andhvc2u:5525: kenāpi grāmataṭāke abhraṃ medhamaṇḍalam uttānitamuttānaṃ kṛtaṃ sat anyathā yathopari tathā jalāntardarśanaṃ na bhavet kṣiptaṃ parantu /
GK16andhvc2u:5526: kamalākarāḥ na malināḥ sañjātamalāḥ malinā iti vā chāyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5529: sahasetyasya sthāne pitṛṣvasa iti chāyāṃ kecit paṭhantītyāha---anya ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5539: yatra tu prakaraṇādipratipattyā nirdhārataviśeṣo vācyo 'rthaḥ punaḥ pratīyamānāṅgatvenaivāvabhāsate so 'syaivānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya dhvanermārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5541: ucciṇasu paḍia kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasuhṇe /
GK16andhvc2u:5542: aha de visamavirāvo samureṇa suo valaasaddo //
GK16andhvc2u:5546: aṅgānītyekamapi na tādṛgaṅgaṃ yadgāmbhīryāvahitthavaśena saṃvarītuṃ pāritam,
GK16andhvc2u:5547: sadintītyāstāṃ gṛhakarmasampādanaṃ svātmānamapi dhartuṃ na prabhavantīti /
GK16andhvc2u:5552: punarvācyaḥ punarapi svaśabdenokto 'ta eva svātmāvagateḥ sampannapūrvatvādena tāvanmātraparyavasāyī na bhavati bālapriyā datteti /
GK16andhvc2u:5553: dattasaṅketo yaścauryakāmuko jāraḥ tasya ratasamucitasthāne vetasalatāgahane prāptiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5564: gṛhakarmayoge sphuṭaṃ tathā na lakṣyamāṇānīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5578: vākyajanyabodhaṃ pratyeva prakaraṇādijñānasya hetutvāt upalakṣaṇaṃ cedamanumānādajanyaniścayasya /
GK16andhvc2u:5579: 'uccinvi'tyādau śephālikādhūnanaṃ na kartavyaṃ śvaśurakopādyaniṣṭajanakatvāditi vacanādijanyo bodhayitavyanāyikādigato niścayo grāhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5582_0: ata atra hyavinayapatinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahiḥśrutavalayakalakalayā locanam tathāvidhaśca
GK16andhvc2u:5582_2: sphuṭaṃ vadatā vyaṅgyaguṇībhāve tvetadviparītameva nibandhanaṃ mantavyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc2u:5583: uccinu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālakasnuṣe /
GK16andhvc2u:5584: eṣa te viṣamavipākaḥ śvaśureṇa śruto valayaśabdaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5586: yataḥ śvaśuraḥ śophālikālatikāṃ prayatnai rakṣaṃstasyā ākarṣaṇadhūnanādinā kupyati /
GK16andhvc2u:5589: atra ca 'kassa vā ṇa hoi roso' ityetadanusāreṇa vyākhyā kartavyā /
GK16andhvc2u:5592: svatassiddhatayā avacanīya eva so 'rthaḥ syāditi yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5593: nanvevaṃ vyaṅgyasyopaskāratā pratyutoktā bālapriyā evetyasya vivaraṇam---svāmetyādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5607: śvaśureṇa śrutaḥ san viṣamavipākaḥ viṣamo 'niṣṭajanako vipākaḥ pariṇāmo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5612: atra yatkiñcidvyaṅgyasya vācyāṅgatve 'pi vyaṅgyāntaramādāya dhvanitvamiti darśayati vṛttau--'atre'tyādinā /
GK16andhvc2u:5626: sahṛdayānāṃ tu ramamāṇanāyikāyai sakhī pratibodhayatīti ca jñānaṃ jñāyamānaṃ tadyvaṅgyaṃ vā vācyārthalābhaṃ prati sahakārīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc2u:5637: punarvācya iti grantho yathāvyākhyātastathā sakhyā pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvc2u:5640: evaṃ vivakṣitavācyasya dhvanestadābhāsaviveke prastute satyavivakṣitavācyasyāpi taṃ kartumāha---
GK16andhvc2u:5642: avyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ skhalad-gateḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5643: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhir viṣayo dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5646: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhirviṣayo dhvaneḥ // 32 //
GK16andhvc2u:5659: yathā---- preṅkhatpremaprabandhapracuraparicaye prauḍhasīmantinīnāṃ cittākāśāvakāśe viharati satataṃ yaḥ sa saubhāgyabhūmiḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5661: cittākāśa iti gauṇaḥ prayogaḥ kavinā kṛto 'pi na dhvanyamānarūpasundaraprayojanāṃśaparyavasāyī /
GK16andhvc2u:5674: prastute ityasya ārabdhe prakṛte iti vā vyākhyāne sati tatpadamasaṅgataṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5680: premṇaḥ prabandhaḥ prakarṣeṇa bandhaḥ sthirīkaraṇaṃ tena saha pracuraḥ paricayo yasya tasmin /
GK16andhvc2u:5686: skhaladgaterupacaritasya śabdasyāvyutpatteraśaktervā nibandho yaḥ sa ca na dhvanerviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5690: yad vyaṅgyasyāṅgi-bhūtasya tat pūrṇaṃ dhvani-lakṣaṇam // DhvK_2.33 //
GK16andhvc2u:5694: locanam yathā---- viṣamakāṇḍakuṭumbakasañcayapravara vārinidhau patatā tvayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5698: atraitat kāmapi kāntiṃ na puṣyata, ṛte vṛttapūraṇāt /
GK16andhvc2u:5700: prathamoddyote yaḥ prasiddhyanurodhapravartitavyavahārāḥ kavaya ityatra 'vadati bisinīpatrraśayanam' ityādi bhākta uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5701: sa na kevalaṃ dhvanerna viṣayo yāvadayamanyo 'pīti caśabdasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5702: uktameva dhvanisvarūpaṃ tadābhāsavivekahetutayā kārikākāro 'nuvadatītyabhiprāyeṇa vṛttikṛdupaskāraṃ dadāti--yata iti /
GK16andhvc2u:5710: viṣamaḥ viṣamasaṃkhyākaḥ kāṇḍaśśaro yasya tasya kāmadevasya,
GK16andhvc2u:5711: yaḥ kuḍumbakasañjayaḥ tasya pravaramukhya he candretyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5713: kuraṅgeti pāṭhe ca latākuraṅgeṇa mṛgeṇa vidhūrṇitaṃ bhājanaṃ madhyabhāgo yasya tasminnityātmaviśeṣaṇam /
GK16andhvc2u:5721: sa ceti cakāraḥ prathamodyotoktasamuccāyaka ityāha--prathamadyoto ityādi /
GK16andhvc2u:5727: avabhāsanapadena avabhāsamānaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5738: vṛttāvevakāreṇa tato 'nyasya cābhāsarūpatvameveti sūcayatā tadābhāsavivekahetubhāvoyaḥ prakrantaḥ sa eva nirvāhita iti śivam //
GK16andhvc2u:5741: iti śrīmahāmāheśvarācāryavaryābhinavaguptonmīlite sahṛdayāloka locane dhvanisaṅkete dvitīya uddyotaḥ //
GK16andhvc2u:5748: yayā māyārūpayā parameśvaryā prājyaṃ prabhūtam idaṃ jagadati prathamāntatayā /
GK16andhvc2u:5750: prollāsaḥ pratītistanmātram sat na tu vastusaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc2u:5754: idaṃ jagatpaśyantīṃ tāmabhinavagupto 'haṃ vande iti sambandhaḥ /
